original: aom lo tsa na ba su de sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom lo tsa na ba su de sv'a h'a /
translated: Om lochanavasudeva svaha.

original: zhes pa'i sngags kyis so //
analyzed: zhes pa'i sngags kyis so //
translated: With this mantra.

original: de nas gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud ba dpa' bos bcad pa ltar nyos pa dang kha dog bzang po lngas bsgyur la /
analyzed: de nas gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud ba dpa' bos bcad pa ltar nyos pa dang kha dog bzang po lngas bsgyur la /
translated: Then, like a hero cutting a rope with which a young woman is bound, the yogin should cut the thread, and dye it with the five good colors.

original: aom a'am a'i r'i a'um l'im badzra s'u tra @124b sarba dharm'a ae ka a'a k'a ra sva bh'a we na ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom a'am a'i r'i a'um l'im badzra s'u tra @124b sarba dharm'a ae ka a'a k'a ra sva bh'a we na ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
translated: Om aam a: ram aum liim vajrasutra sarvadharma eka aakara sva bhawen kuru kuru svaha.

original: zhes pas byin gyis brlabs la dril sogs pas mchod de shar phyogs kyis gzhi la bzhugs su gsol lo //
analyzed: zhes pas byin gyis brlabs la dril sogs pas mchod de shar phyogs kyis gzhi la bzhugs su gsol lo //
translated: With this mantra he should consecrate it, and worship it with a bell and so forth. He should request it to reside in the eastern direction.

original: de nas mu tig la sogs pa'am 'bras s'a si la sogs pa las byung ba'i legs par tshos su btsos pa'i tshon rnams la /
analyzed: de nas mu tig la sogs pa'am 'bras s'a si la sogs pa las byung ba'i legs par tshos su btsos pa'i tshon rnams la /
translated: Then, with pearls and so forth or with rice and so forth, he should cook the colors well.

original: aom aam ai ri aum lim su bi shuddha panytsa skandha sva bha wa pnyatsa skandha na su bi shuddha dharman ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom aam ai ri aum lim su bi shuddha panytsa skandha sva bha wa pnyatsa skandha na su bi shuddha dharman ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
translated: Om am e ram om liim suvisuddha panca skandhasvabhava panca skandhan suvisuddha dharman kuru kuru svaha.

original: zhes pas byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: zhes pas byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: With this mantra he should consecrate it.

original: dri la sogs pa byin te tshon gyi snod rnams nub phyogs su gzhag go //
analyzed: dri la sogs pa byin te tshon gyi snod rnams nub phyogs su gzhag go //
translated: Having anointed the colors, etc., place the vessels of the colors in the west.

original: de nas rdo rje mtshan nyid dang ldan pas aom h'um kro dha badzra sarba satva k'a ru na a'atma k'a sarba dharmma ae ka su kha sva bh'a wa sarba dharmm'a na badzra su kha sv'a bh'a wa na ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /🔽zhes pa dang bcas pas lho phyogs su gzhag go //🔽de nas rdo rje dril bu la aom ho //🔽badzra ghande sarba dharm'a ae ka pradzny'a dh'a ni sva bh'a we sarba a'a k'a re sarba dharm'a pra bo dha ni sarba dharma sva bh'a we na pra bo dha ya pra bo dha ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje mtshan nyid dang ldan pas aom h'um kro dha badzra sarba satva k'a ru na a'atma k'a sarba dharmma ae ka su kha sva bh'a wa sarba dharmm'a na badzra su kha sv'a bh'a wa na ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a / zhes pa dang bcas pas lho phyogs su gzhag go // de nas rdo rje dril bu la aom ho // badzra ghande sarba dharm'a ae ka pradzny'a dh'a ni sva bh'a we sarba a'a k'a re sarba dharm'a pra bo dha ni sarba dharma sva bh'a we na pra bo dha ya pra bo dha ya sv'a h'a /
translated: Then, with a vajra that has the characteristics, and with “Oṃ hūṃ krodha vajra sarva sattva kāruṇā ātmaka sarva dharma eka sukhā svabhāva sarva dharma anaya vajra sukhā svabhāva na kurukuru svāhā,” place it in the south.

original: zhes pa dang dri la sogs pa byin la byang phyogs su gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa dang dri la sogs pa byin la byang phyogs su gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Then, with the vajra and bell, “Oṃ hoḥ vajra ghaṇḍe sarva dharma eka prajñādhāni svabhāve sarva akāre sarva dharma prabodhani sarva dharma svabhāve na prabodhaya prabodhaya svāhā,” having anointed with scent, etc., place it in the north.

original: 'di ni bum pa la sogs pa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bum pa la sogs pa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: This is the ritual of the vase, etc., consecration.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi la dri zhim po'i me tog rab tu dgram par byas nas lha rnams kyi gnas so sor bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i dri zhim pos mandala byas te /
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi la dri zhim po'i me tog rab tu dgram par byas nas lha rnams kyi gnas so sor bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i dri zhim pos mandala byas te /
translated: Then, having spread out fragrant flowers on the mandala base, in the individual places of the deities make a mandala with the five nectars and fragrances.

original: de nyid la rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis 'khor lo'i gtso bo dang bcas pa'i lha tshogs spyan drangs la gdan rnams la rim pa bzhin bzhugs par byas pa dang / zhabs bsil la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
analyzed: de nyid la rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis 'khor lo'i gtso bo dang bcas pa'i lha tshogs spyan drangs la gdan rnams la rim pa bzhin bzhugs par byas pa dang / zhabs bsil la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
translated: Having invited the assembly of deities with the principal one of the wheel with light rays from the seed syllable in one's heart to those very [mandalas], one should cause them to sequentially sit on the seats and make perfect offerings with the foot washing water, and so forth.

original: bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myang bar byas nas pus mo g-yas pa sa la btsugs te lce h'um las rdo rje rtse gcig pa h'um gis mtshan par bskyed la lag pa g-yas pas spros snod bzung ste g-yon pas dril bu dkrol zhing brjod pa /
analyzed: bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myang bar byas nas pus mo g-yas pa sa la btsugs te lce h'um las rdo rje rtse gcig pa h'um gis mtshan par bskyed la lag pa g-yas pas spros snod bzung ste g-yon pas dril bu dkrol zhing brjod pa /
translated: Having praised and tasted the elixir, having placed the right knee on the ground, having generated the tongue as a single-pointed vajra marked with hūṃ, having held the incense pot with the right hand, having rung the bell with the left hand, one should recite:

original: bcom ldan dus kyi 'khor lo nyid //
analyzed: bcom ldan dus kyi 'khor lo nyid //
translated: I pay homage to Bhagavat Kālacakratantra,

original: rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: the king of awareness mantras.

original: dkyil 'khor snying rje'i bdag nyid can //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor snying rje'i bdag nyid can //
translated: The maṇḍala is the nature of compassion,

original: bra bar 'dod do mgon po kye //
analyzed: bra bar 'dod do mgon po kye //
translated: O protector, I wish to draw it.🔽In order to take care of the disciples

original: slob ma rjes su gzung phyir dang // khyod nyid mchod par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: slob ma rjes su gzung phyir dang // khyod nyid mchod par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: and in order to worship you,🔽therefore, O Bhagavān,

original: de phyir bcom ldan nyid la bdag / gus pas bka' drin gnang bar zhu //
analyzed: de phyir bcom ldan nyid la bdag / gus pas bka' drin gnang bar zhu //
translated: I respectfully request your kindness.

original: bdag la dgongs shig sangs rgyas rnams //
analyzed: bdag la dgongs shig sangs rgyas rnams //
translated: Please consider me, O buddhas,

original: 'gro la 'khor lo'i bya ba ster //
analyzed: 'gro la 'khor lo'i bya ba ster //
translated: granting the activity of the wheel to beings.🔽The gods of the virtuous mantra path,🔽the guardians of the directions and other gods,

original: lam la gnas pa'i bde sems dang // gang dge sngags kyi lha rnams dang // phyogs skyong rnams dang lha gzhan dang // byang chub mthar skyong 'byung po dang // @125a * //
analyzed: lam la gnas pa'i bde sems dang // gang dge sngags kyi lha rnams dang // phyogs skyong rnams dang lha gzhan dang // byang chub mthar skyong 'byung po dang // @125a * //
translated: the bhūtas who protect the culmination of enlightenment,🔽and the beings who guard the teachings,🔽those who possess the vajra eye,

original: bstan pa skyong ba'i sems can dang // gang dag rdo rje'i spyan ldan dang // bdag ni rdo rje che ge nyid //
analyzed: bstan pa skyong ba'i sems can dang // gang dag rdo rje'i spyan ldan dang // bdag ni rdo rje che ge nyid //
translated: and I myself, the great vajra,

original: dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ni //
analyzed: dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ni //
translated: the maṇḍala of the Kālacakra

original: 'gro rnams ngag phyir bri bar bya //
analyzed: 'gro rnams ngag phyir bri bar bya //
translated: should be drawn for the sake of beings.

original: ji ltar nus pa de bzhin du //
analyzed: ji ltar nus pa de bzhin du //
translated: As much as possible,

original: rjes su brtse ba dang / ldan pas //
analyzed: rjes su brtse ba dang / ldan pas //
translated: with loving kindness,

original: bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la /
analyzed: bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la /
translated: Together with my disciples,

original: dkyil 'khor dang bcas ma lus pa //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dang bcas ma lus pa //
translated: together with the maṇḍala, without exception,

original: nye bar byon par mdzad du gsol //
analyzed: nye bar byon par mdzad du gsol //
translated: please come near.

original: zhes pa'i don go bar byas la lan gsum du gsol ba gdab bo //
analyzed: zhes pa'i don go bar byas la lan gsum du gsol ba gdab bo //
translated: Having understood the meaning of this, one should supplicate three times.

original: yang me tog la sogs pas mchod pa bya'o //
analyzed: yang me tog la sogs pas mchod pa bya'o //
translated: Again, one should make offerings with flowers, and so forth.

original: 'di ni lha lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lha lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: This is the ritual of the consecration of the deity.

original: de nas srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom pa sngon du song bas bcom ldan 'das kyi rnal 'byor la dmigs par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom pa sngon du song bas bcom ldan 'das kyi rnal 'byor la dmigs par bya'o //
translated: Then, having meditated on the protection wheel beforehand, one should focus on the yoga of the Bhagavān.

original: yang gshegs su gsol ba dang / rkang pa bcu drug pa'i sngags lan bdun bzlas te /
analyzed: yang gshegs su gsol ba dang / rkang pa bcu drug pa'i sngags lan bdun bzlas te /
translated: Again, one should request departure and recite the sixteen-line mantra seven times.

original: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i cho gas nyal bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i cho gas nyal bar bya'o //
translated: One should go to sleep by the ritual that will be explained.

original: de yang ji srid dge ba'i mtshan ma mthong ba'i bar du ste /
analyzed: de yang ji srid dge ba'i mtshan ma mthong ba'i bar du ste /
translated: Moreover, one should do this until one sees a virtuous sign.

original: mi dge ba mthong na gsungs par 'gyur ba'i cho gas gtor ma sbyin par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: mi dge ba mthong na gsungs par 'gyur ba'i cho gas gtor ma sbyin par bya'o zhes so //
translated: If one sees an inauspicious sign, one should give a torma by the ritual that will be explained.🔽Then,

original: de nas / dam tshig 'da' bar the tshom na //
analyzed: de nas / dam tshig 'da' bar the tshom na //
translated: if one doubts transgressing the commitments,

original: slob ma min pa mi gzhug go //
analyzed: slob ma min pa mi gzhug go //
translated: one should not admit non-disciples.

original: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: sgo rnams su sngon du rang gis dbang bskur ba'i slob ma mtshan nyid dang ldan pa gsung bar 'gyur ba'i brtul zhugs kyi nges pa dang ldan pa rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi dang bral pa gsung bar 'gyur ba'i sdom pa sngon du song bas sam /
analyzed: sgo rnams su sngon du rang gis dbang bskur ba'i slob ma mtshan nyid dang ldan pa gsung bar 'gyur ba'i brtul zhugs kyi nges pa dang ldan pa rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi dang bral pa gsung bar 'gyur ba'i sdom pa sngon du song bas sam /
translated: At the doors, the disciples who have previously been initiated by oneself, who have the characteristics, who have the certainty of the conduct that will be explained, who are free from the fourteen root downfalls, and who have previously taken the vows that will be explained, or

original: slob dpon gyi sdom pa sdom pa sngon du song bas shar gyi sgo ru bsdad pa la lhag par gnas pa'i tshogs gdul byar gyur pa lhag par bya'o //
analyzed: slob dpon gyi sdom pa sdom pa sngon du song bas shar gyi sgo ru bsdad pa la lhag par gnas pa'i tshogs gdul byar gyur pa lhag par bya'o //
translated: who have the master’s vows, should be seated at the eastern door. The disciples who are to be guided should be especially gathered.

original: de yang bzhis bya ba'am gcig gis sam gzhan yang lnga pa las kyi rdo rjes sam /
analyzed: de yang bzhis bya ba'am gcig gis sam gzhan yang lnga pa las kyi rdo rjes sam /
translated: That is done by four or one.

original: de rnams med na rang nyid kyis bya ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams med na rang nyid kyis bya ba'o //
translated: If those are not present, one should do it oneself.

original: de ltar slob ma lhag par gnas pa tsam bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar slob ma lhag par gnas pa tsam bya ba'o //
translated: Thus, only the disciples’ preparatory rite is performed.

original: lhag par gnas pa'i don du dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bzhugs pa la yang dag par mchod pa dang / ye shes kyi thig la sogs pa'i don du dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi'i steng ge nam mkha' la blos dmigs nas mtshan ma mthong ba dang /
analyzed: lhag par gnas pa'i don du dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bzhugs pa la yang dag par mchod pa dang / ye shes kyi thig la sogs pa'i don du dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi'i steng ge nam mkha' la blos dmigs nas mtshan ma mthong ba dang /
translated: In order to consecrate the gnosis lines, and so on, one should visualize the sky above the mandala ground and see the signs.

original: kha shar du phyogs te dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas sngar brjod pa'i thig skud lag pa g-yon pa'i mthil du sor mo'i rtse mo dang rtsa ba'i bar du bzung la /
analyzed: kha shar du phyogs te dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas sngar brjod pa'i thig skud lag pa g-yon pa'i mthil du sor mo'i rtse mo dang rtsa ba'i bar du bzung la /
translated: Facing east, endowed with the yoga of the principal deity of the mandala, one should hold the thread of the lines in the palm of one's left hand between the tips of the fingers and the base of the fingers.

original: aom a'a: h'um ho ham rnams las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i thugs ka rnams su aom yig la sogs pa las yongs su rdzogs pa'i ye @125b shes kyi thig 'od zer gyi rang bzhin bltas la /
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um ho ham rnams las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i thugs ka rnams su aom yig la sogs pa las yongs su rdzogs pa'i ye @125b shes kyi thig 'od zer gyi rang bzhin bltas la /
translated: One should visualize the gnosis lines completely perfect from the syllable om and so on at the hearts of the five tathagatas arisen from om, ah, hum, ho, and ham, the nature of light rays.

original: aom a'a: sh'a shva ta badzra /
analyzed: aom a'a: sh'a shva ta badzra /
translated: Om ah sha shva ta vajra.

original: s'u tr'am me pra yatstsha ma h'a mandala s'u tra n'a ya h'um /
analyzed: s'u tr'am me pra yatstsha ma h'a mandala s'u tra n'a ya h'um /
translated: Sutram me prayaccha maha mandala sutra na yaya hum.

original: zhes pa'i sngags kyis rnam par snang mdzad la gsol ba gdab bo //
analyzed: zhes pa'i sngags kyis rnam par snang mdzad la gsol ba gdab bo //
translated: With this mantra, one should supplicate Vairocana.

original: de nas ming rjes la na tan sam bha ba la sogs pa yang ngo //
analyzed: de nas ming rjes la na tan sam bha ba la sogs pa yang ngo //
translated: Then, after the name, one should say “namas sambhavaḥ” and so forth.

original: dza yig las byung ba'i zla ba dang nyi ma ser po mig gnyis la bkod de /
analyzed: dza yig las byung ba'i zla ba dang nyi ma ser po mig gnyis la bkod de /
translated: From the syllable jaḥ, one should place a yellow moon and sun in the two eyes.

original: aom d'i pta dri sht'am ku shi dza:/
analyzed: aom d'i pta dri sht'am ku shi dza:/
translated: Om dīpta-dṛṣṭi-kuśajaḥ.

original: zhes brjod la mig gnyis rab tu bskyod cing rdzi mas dgug pa ni 'bar bzhin pa'i lta stangs kyi lcags kyu lta bus rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa spros la de rnams bkug cing bkug la lag pa na gnas pa'i thig so so'i kha dog la gzhug
analyzed: zhes brjod la mig gnyis rab tu bskyod cing rdzi mas dgug pa ni 'bar bzhin pa'i lta stangs kyi lcags kyu lta bus rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa spros la de rnams bkug cing bkug la lag pa na gnas pa'i thig so so'i kha dog la gzhug
translated: Reciting this, one should open and close the two eyes, and with the hook of the blazing-flame gaze, one should emanate Vairocana and so forth. Having summoned them, one should place them in the chalk line in one’s hand, each in its own color.

original: go // de lta bu des 'di rnams me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: go // de lta bu des 'di rnams me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid do //
translated: In this way, they are the nature of the five gnoses, such as the mirror-like gnosis.

original: de nas slob ma rnams rnam par snang mdzad dam rdo rje shugs kyis gzugs su byas la de dang stabs cig tu dang por thig skud lnga lnga re re ru bkal la de nas de ltar bkal pa lnga skud pa gcig tu bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nas slob ma rnams rnam par snang mdzad dam rdo rje shugs kyis gzugs su byas la de dang stabs cig tu dang por thig skud lnga lnga re re ru bkal la de nas de ltar bkal pa lnga skud pa gcig tu bya ba ni /
translated: Then, the disciples, having become the form of Vairocana or Vajravega, together with him, first the five strings are strung one by one, and then those five strings are made into one string.

original: aom a'a: aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta: sarba dharm'a spa ra spa r'a nu pra wi shta: sarba dharm'a aa dyan t'a nu pra wishtha: sarba dharm'a: aom a'a: h'um zhes brjod cing srid du dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur la sboms su slob dpon gyis nas kyi tshad🔽du bkal bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom a'a: aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta: sarba dharm'a spa ra spa r'a nu pra wi shta: sarba dharm'a aa dyan t'a nu pra wishtha: sarba dharm'a: aom a'a: h'um zhes brjod cing srid du dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur la sboms su slob dpon gyis nas kyi tshad du bkal bar bya'o //
translated: Reciting Om A: Anujnayatu sarvadharmasparsananuvishtasarvadharmadhyanatvanuvishtasarvadharmas Om A: Hum, the string is strung twice the size of the maṇḍala in length and the size of a barley grain in thickness by the master.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi nub kyi phyogs kyi sa gzhi la kha shar du phyogs te rdo rje'i thig me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la de nas shri khanda 'bras s'a lu'i phye ma la sogs pa la sbags te slob dpon gyi lag pa g-yon
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi nub kyi phyogs kyi sa gzhi la kha shar du phyogs te rdo rje'i thig me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la de nas shri khanda 'bras s'a lu'i phye ma la sogs pa la sbags te slob dpon gyi lag pa g-yon
translated: Then, on the ground in the west of the maṇḍala, facing east, having made offerings to the vajra line with flowers, and so on, then, having mixed it with the flour of rice, wheat, and so on, the master's left

original: pas skud pa bsdus la nub tu gnas te /
analyzed: pas skud pa bsdus la nub tu gnas te /
translated: The master, having placed the thread, should stand in the west,

original: kha shar du phyogs pas dkyil 'khor gyis gzhil brkyang ste sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: kha shar du phyogs pas dkyil 'khor gyis gzhil brkyang ste sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
translated: facing east, and should extend the base line of the maṇḍala, reciting this mantra:

original: aom a'a: h'um k'a ya b'a ka tsitta ae ka bh'u ta /
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um k'a ya b'a ka tsitta ae ka bh'u ta /
translated: Oṃ āḥ hūṃ kāya vāk citta eka bhūta🔽sarva dharma eka kāraṇa vajra sattva haṃ🔽vajra bhūmi sūtraya mi hūṃ āḥ phaṭ.

original: sarba dharma / ae k'a k'a re na badzra sa tva ham badzra bh'u mi s'u tra y'a mi h'um a'a: phat ces pa dang / de nas yang /
analyzed: sarba dharma / ae k'a k'a re na badzra sa tva ham badzra bh'u mi s'u tra y'a mi h'um a'a: phat ces pa dang / de nas yang /
translated: Then, again:🔽Oṃ vajra sūtraya eka kāraṇa svabhāva jñānena jaḥ jaḥ jaḥ

original: aom badzra s'u tr'a ae k'a k'a ra sva ru pe na dza: dza: dza: sarba dharm'a na s'u tra aom a'a: hum ho ham ksha phat /
analyzed: aom badzra s'u tr'a ae k'a k'a ra sva ru pe na dza: dza: dza: sarba dharm'a na s'u tra aom a'a: hum ho ham ksha phat /
translated: sarva dharmāṇa sūtraya oṃ āḥ hūṃ ho haṃ kṣa phaṭ.

original: ces pas rkang pa g-yon pas phyed krung bcas nas g-yas pa sa la bzhag ste slob ma de las bzlog pas so //🔽slob dpon lho'i sa gzhi la gnas nas //
analyzed: ces pas rkang pa g-yon pas phyed krung bcas nas g-yas pa sa la bzhag ste slob ma de las bzlog pas so // slob dpon lho'i sa gzhi la gnas nas //
translated: Having placed the left foot in the half lotus posture, and the right foot on the ground, the disciple should do the opposite.🔽The master, having placed the left foot on the ground in the south,

original: slob ma byang gi sa gzhi la gnas te /
analyzed: slob ma byang gi sa gzhi la gnas te /
translated: the disciple, having placed the left foot on the ground in the north,

original: shar dang shar mi dang / lho dang byang gi tshangs thig gnyis yongs 'dzoms spangs nas lte ba'i thad sor nam mkha'i thig 'debs pa pos rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag pa g-yas pa'i mthe bong gi gung mos skud pa dang bcas pa'i se gol gdab po //
analyzed: shar dang shar mi dang / lho dang byang gi tshangs thig gnyis yongs 'dzoms spangs nas lte ba'i thad sor nam mkha'i thig 'debs pa pos rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag pa g-yas pa'i mthe bong gi gung mos skud pa dang bcas pa'i se gol gdab po //
translated: Having avoided the eastern and northeastern and southern and northern Brahmapāśas, the one who is going to draw the thread of the sky at the navel should snap his fingers with his right hand together with the thread and the vajra.

original: thig rnams 'debs pa'i dus @126a * //
analyzed: thig rnams 'debs pa'i dus @126a * //
translated: At the time of drawing the lines,

original: su ; aom badzra sa ma ya h'um s'u tram m'a ti kra ma h'um h'um aom sva a'a:/
analyzed: su ; aom badzra sa ma ya h'um s'u tram m'a ti kra ma h'um h'um aom sva a'a:/
translated: one should say, “Oṃ vajra-samaya hūṃ sutra mātrikrama hūṃ hūṃ oṃ svāhā.”

original: zhes brjod pa'i sgras nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa blta'o //
analyzed: zhes brjod pa'i sgras nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa blta'o //
translated: One should see the Tathāgatas pervading the entire realm of space with the sound of this utterance.

original: de rnams 'ongs te skud pa la thim par bsam mo //
analyzed: de rnams 'ongs te skud pa la thim par bsam mo //
translated: One should imagine that they arrive and dissolve into the thread.

original: de nas nam mkha'i thig gnyis ji lta bar sa gzhi la tshangs pa'i thig gnyis ka'i lag pa skud pa dang bcas pa mnyam par phab ste gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas nam mkha'i thig gnyis ji lta bar sa gzhi la tshangs pa'i thig gnyis ka'i lag pa skud pa dang bcas pa mnyam par phab ste gdab par bya'o //
translated: Then, just as with the two threads of the sky, one should lower the two threads of Brahmā on the ground with one’s hands together with the thread and snap one’s fingers.

original: de ltar slob dpon me mtshams gnas te rlung mtshams kyi thig go //
analyzed: de ltar slob dpon me mtshams gnas te rlung mtshams kyi thig go //
translated: Thus, the master, standing in the southeast, draws the thread of the southwest.

original: bden bral gnas te dbang ldan mtshams kyi thig go //
analyzed: bden bral gnas te dbang ldan mtshams kyi thig go //
translated: The thread of the northeast corner is in the southwest.

original: slob ma de las bzlog par gnas so //🔽thig skud chad na bla ma 'jig ste /
analyzed: slob ma de las bzlog par gnas so // thig skud chad na bla ma 'jig ste /
translated: The disciple is in the opposite position.🔽If the thread breaks, the guru will die.

original: gzhan yang yongs su 'joms byed 'goms na bu rnams de bzhin 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhan yang yongs su 'joms byed 'goms na bu rnams de bzhin 'gyur //
translated: And if the thread is stepped on, the disciples will be destroyed.

original: zhes pa'i don gyis legs par gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'i don gyis legs par gdab par bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should cast the thread well.

original: de nas tshangs thig las g-yas dang gzhan pa'i phyogs su gtso bo'i padma'i lte ba dang sgo'i padma'i don du thig gnyis pa gdab pa'o //
analyzed: de nas tshangs thig las g-yas dang gzhan pa'i phyogs su gtso bo'i padma'i lte ba dang sgo'i padma'i don du thig gnyis pa gdab pa'o //
translated: Then, to the right and left of the Brahmā thread, one should cast two threads for the center of the principal lotus and for the door lotus.

original: de las cha gcig spangs par sgo khyud kyi nang gi rtsig pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: de las cha gcig spangs par sgo khyud kyi nang gi rtsig pa'i don du'o //
translated: One part from that is for the inner wall of the door frame.

original: de las cha gcig spangs pa ka ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: de las cha gcig spangs pa ka ba'i don du'o //
translated: One part from that is for the pillars.

original: de las cha phyed spangs pa phyi'i rtsig pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: de las cha phyed spangs pa phyi'i rtsig pa'i don du'o //
translated: One half part from that is for the outer wall.

original: de las gtso bo'i padma'i 'dab ma'i don du phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de las gtso bo'i padma'i 'dab ma'i don du phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gnyis pa'o //
translated: Two and a half parts from that are for the petals of the principal lotus.

original: de nas cha gcig spangs pa rdo rje phreng ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: de nas cha gcig spangs pa rdo rje phreng ba'i don du'o //
translated: Then, one part from that is for the vajra fence.

original: de las cha phyed spangs par logs kyi nang gi rtsig pa'i don du'o ;🔽/ de las phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gcig gis logs kyi phyi'i rtsig pa'i thig go //
analyzed: de las cha phyed spangs par logs kyi nang gi rtsig pa'i don du'o ; / de las phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gcig gis logs kyi phyi'i rtsig pa'i thig go //
translated: One half of that is for the inner wall of the enclosure.🔽One half of that is for the line of the outer wall of the enclosure.

original: de las phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gcig la rta babs kyi ka ba'i bar gyi thig go //
analyzed: de las phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gcig la rta babs kyi ka ba'i bar gyi thig go //
translated: One half of that is for the line between the pillars of the gateway.

original: de las cha phyed spangs par lha snam kyi  padma'i thig go //
analyzed: de las cha phyed spangs par lha snam kyi  padma'i thig go //
translated: One half of that is for the lotus of the base of the deity.

original: de las cha gcig spangs pa rdo rje phreng ba'i thig go //
analyzed: de las cha gcig spangs pa rdo rje phreng ba'i thig go //
translated: One cubit is for the line of the vajra garland.

original: rdo rje phreng ba'i thig gnyis kyi bar du lha snam kyi padma'i cha bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje phreng ba'i thig gnyis kyi bar du lha snam kyi padma'i cha bzhi pa'o //
translated: Between the two lines of the vajra garland, there are four parts for the lotus of the base of the deity.

original: de dag gi logs dag la ka ba dag gi rgyal cha gcig pa dpangs su cha bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gi logs dag la ka ba dag gi rgyal cha gcig pa dpangs su cha bzhi pa'o //
translated: On those walls, the pillars are one cubit apart and four cubits high.

original: de dag gi logs dag la bum pa'i gnas rgyal cha gsum pa dpangs snga ma dang mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gi logs dag la bum pa'i gnas rgyal cha gsum pa dpangs snga ma dang mtshungs pa'o //
translated: On those walls, the vase section is three cubits high and the same height as before.

original: de dag gi logs dag la ka ba dag go //
analyzed: de dag gi logs dag la ka ba dag go //
translated: On those walls, there are pillars.

original: phyi rol gyi rdo rje phreng ba'i thig gi phyi rol las cha chung bdun spangs pa la thig gdab bo //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi rdo rje phreng ba'i thig gi phyi rol las cha chung bdun spangs pa la thig gdab bo //
translated: Outside the outer vajra garland line, seven small units are abandoned, and a line is drawn.

original: de las cha bzhi spangs pa la lha rnams kyi snam bu'i thig go //
analyzed: de las cha bzhi spangs pa la lha rnams kyi snam bu'i thig go //
translated: Four units are abandoned from that, and a line of the wall of the gods.

original: de las cha gcig spangs pa la rtsa ba'i thig ste zur thig gi bar bu'o //
analyzed: de las cha gcig spangs pa la rtsa ba'i thig ste zur thig gi bar bu'o //
translated: One unit is abandoned from that, and a line of the root, up to the corner lines.

original: rtsa ba'i thig gi bar ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i thig gi bar ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The area up to the root line is the mind mandala.

original: de ltar gsung dang sku'i dkyil 'khor la yang ngo //
analyzed: de ltar gsung dang sku'i dkyil 'khor la yang ngo //
translated: Likewise, it is for the speech and body mandalas.

original: tshangs pa'i @126b thig las g-yas dang g-yon gyi thig gnyis dbyi bar byas pas cha drug pa 'khor lo'i brgyad cha ni sgo ru 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i @126b thig las g-yas dang g-yon gyi thig gnyis dbyi bar byas pas cha drug pa 'khor lo'i brgyad cha ni sgo ru 'gyur ro //
translated: From the Brahmā line, the two lines to the right and left are erased, and a six-part wheel is made. One-eighth of the wheel is a door.

original: sgo khyud dang logs dang ngos rnams ni sgo dang 'tsham mo //
analyzed: sgo khyud dang logs dang ngos rnams ni sgo dang 'tsham mo //
translated: The door frame, wall, and side are the same as the door.

original: rtsa ba'i thig las phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gcig spangs pa rtsig pa'i thig go //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i thig las phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gcig spangs pa rtsig pa'i thig go //
translated: One and a half units are abandoned from the root line, and a line of the wall.

original: de las cha gsum spangs pa 'dod yon gyi thig go //
analyzed: de las cha gsum spangs pa 'dod yon gyi thig go //
translated: Three units are abandoned from that, and a line of the sense offerings.

original: de nas phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gcig spangs pa rin po che pha gu'i thig go //
analyzed: de nas phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gcig spangs pa rin po che pha gu'i thig go //
translated: Then, having abandoned one part together with a half, there is the line of precious bricks.

original: de las cha gsum spangs pa dra ba phyed pa'i thig go //
analyzed: de las cha gsum spangs pa dra ba phyed pa'i thig go //
translated: Having abandoned three parts from that, there is the line of half-nets.

original: de nas phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gcig spangs pa ba gu la'i snam bu'o //
analyzed: de nas phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gcig spangs pa ba gu la'i snam bu'o //
translated: Then, having abandoned one part together with a half, there is the platform of the balustrade.

original: de nyid dang mtshungs pa kra ma shirsha'o //
analyzed: de nyid dang mtshungs pa kra ma shirsha'o //
translated: That itself is Kramaśiras.

original: 'di rnams ma lus pa zur thig nas zur thig gi tshad kyis so //
analyzed: 'di rnams ma lus pa zur thig nas zur thig gi tshad kyis so //
translated: All of these are measured by the distance from corner line to corner line.

original: de nas ka ba'i steng du rta babs sgo'i sum 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas ka ba'i steng du rta babs sgo'i sum 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, above the pillars, there is the pediment, which is one-third the size of the gate.

original: de nyid sum brtsegs byas te dang po la cha drug pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid sum brtsegs byas te dang po la cha drug pa'o //
translated: That itself is made in three tiers. The first is six parts.

original: gnyis pa la phyed dang bcas pa'i cha bzhi'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa la phyed dang bcas pa'i cha bzhi'o //
translated: The second is four parts together with a half.

original: gsum pa la phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gsum mo //
analyzed: gsum pa la phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gsum mo //
translated: The third is three parts together with a half.

original: ha ra mi la gnyis so //
analyzed: ha ra mi la gnyis so //
translated: There are two for the harmika.

original: bum pa la yang cha gnyis so //
analyzed: bum pa la yang cha gnyis so //
translated: There are also two parts for the vase.

original: de yang rtseg dang po'i ka ba'i steng la snam bu'i zhing la cha nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa dpangs la cha gcig pa'o //
analyzed: de yang rtseg dang po'i ka ba'i steng la snam bu'i zhing la cha nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa dpangs la cha gcig pa'o //
translated: Moreover, on top of the pillar of the first tier, the field of the platform is twenty-four parts and the height is one part.

original: de'i steng du ma da aa pa ra na cha gcig pa zheng la cha bcu drug pa'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du ma da aa pa ra na cha gcig pa zheng la cha bcu drug pa'o //
translated: On top of that is the Madana-parna, one part wide, sixteen parts long.

original: de'i steng du cha bzhi pa grub bzhi pa'i dbus su mchod pa'i lha mo'i gnas so //
analyzed: de'i steng du cha bzhi pa grub bzhi pa'i dbus su mchod pa'i lha mo'i gnas so //
translated: On top of that is the four-part, four-sided base of the offering goddesses.

original: de'i logs dag la ka ba cha gcig pa dag go //
analyzed: de'i logs dag la ka ba cha gcig pa dag go //
translated: On the sides of that are the one-part pillars.

original: de dag gi logs dag la yang mchod pa'i lha mo'i gnas dag go ;
analyzed: de dag gi logs dag la yang mchod pa'i lha mo'i gnas dag go ;
translated: On the sides of those are the bases of the offering goddesses.

original: / de dag gi logs dag la yang ka ba dag go //
analyzed: / de dag gi logs dag la yang ka ba dag go //
translated: On the sides of those are the pillars.

original: de dag gi logs dag la rta babs kyi ka ba dag gi steng du mche ba can gyi glang po'i mgo seng ges mnan pa dag gi steng du snam bu'i zheng la cha bco brgyad pa dpangs su cha gcig pa /🔽de'i steng du mad aa par na dpangs la cha gcig zheng la cha bcu gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gi logs dag la rta babs kyi ka ba dag gi steng du mche ba can gyi glang po'i mgo seng ges mnan pa dag gi steng du snam bu'i zheng la cha bco brgyad pa dpangs su cha gcig pa / de'i steng du mad aa par na dpangs la cha gcig zheng la cha bcu gnyis pa'o //
translated: On the sides of those are the pillars of the archways, on top of which are the heads of tusked elephants suppressed by lions. On top of those are the ledges, eighteen parts wide, one part high.🔽On top of that is the Madana-parna, one part high, twelve parts wide.

original: de'i steng gi snam bu'i dpangs su cha gnyis pa zheng la cha bcu gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de'i steng gi snam bu'i dpangs su cha gnyis pa zheng la cha bcu gnyis pa'o //
translated: On top of that is the two-part ledge, twelve parts wide.

original: de nyid la bzhi chas ma gang ba'i cha gcig pa'i ka ba rnams so //
analyzed: de nyid la bzhi chas ma gang ba'i cha gcig pa'i ka ba rnams so //
translated: The pillars are one-fourth of that, with one part left over.

original: ka ba'i bar rnams su lha gsum gyi gnas cha gsum gsum pa'o //
analyzed: ka ba'i bar rnams su lha gsum gyi gnas cha gsum gsum pa'o //
translated: The spaces between the pillars are three parts each for the locations of the three deities.

original: phyi'i ka bdag gi logs dag las s'a la bhanydzi k'a dag go //
analyzed: phyi'i ka bdag gi logs dag las s'a la bhanydzi k'a dag go //
translated: On the outer sides of the pillars are sālabhañjikās.

original: de dag gi mgo po'i steng du cha phyed pa'i snam bu zheng la cha bco lnga pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gi mgo po'i steng du cha phyed pa'i snam bu zheng la cha bco lnga pa'o //
translated: Above their heads is a ledge that is half a part wide and fifteen parts long.

original: de'i steng du ma da aa pa ra na cha gcig pa zheng la cha brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du ma da aa pa ra na cha gcig pa zheng la cha brgyad pa'o //
translated: Above that is a madāparṇā that is one part wide and eight parts long.

original: de'i steng du snam bu'i dpangs la gnyis pa zheng la cha brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du snam bu'i dpangs la gnyis pa zheng la cha brgyad pa'o //
translated: Above that is a ledge that is two parts high and eight parts wide.

original: de nyid la ka ba so so la cha phyed dang bzhi'o //
analyzed: de nyid la ka ba so so la cha phyed dang bzhi'o //
translated: On that are four and a half parts for each pillar.

original: ka ba'i bar rnams su lha'i gnas rnams so so la cha gnyis gnyis @127a * //🔽pa gsum mo //
analyzed: ka ba'i bar rnams su lha'i gnas rnams so so la cha gnyis gnyis @127a * // pa gsum mo //
translated: The spaces between the pillars are two parts each for the individual locations of the deities.

original: phyi'i ka ba dag gi logs dag tu sa la bhanydza k'a gnyis so //
analyzed: phyi'i ka ba dag gi logs dag tu sa la bhanydza k'a gnyis so //
translated: The outer sides of the pillars have two sālabhañjikās.

original: de'i steng du dpangs la cha phyed pa'i snam bu'i zheng la cha bcu gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du dpangs la cha phyed pa'i snam bu'i zheng la cha bcu gnyis pa'o //
translated: Above that is a ledge that is half a part high and twelve parts wide.

original: de'i steng du dpangs la cha phyed pa'i snam bu'i zheng la cha bcu gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du dpangs la cha phyed pa'i snam bu'i zheng la cha bcu gnyis pa'o //
translated: On top of that, the width of the half-story is twelve cubits.

original: de'i steng du har mi'i zheng la cha brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du har mi'i zheng la cha brgyad pa'o //
translated: On top of that, the width of the harmika is eight cubits.

original: de'i steng du bum pa'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du bum pa'o //
translated: On top of that is the vase.

original: de dag gi g-yas dang g-yon du rgyal mtshan gyi dbyug pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: de dag gi g-yas dang g-yon du rgyal mtshan gyi dbyug pa'i gnas so //
translated: To the right and left of those are the bases of the flagpole sticks.

original: de ltar snam bu thams cad kyi rtse mo la dril bu dang rnga ma dang me long dang rgyal mtshan dang dar dpyangs rnams so //
analyzed: de ltar snam bu thams cad kyi rtse mo la dril bu dang rnga ma dang me long dang rgyal mtshan dang dar dpyangs rnams so //
translated: Thus, at the top of all the ledges are bells, tassels, mirrors, victory banners, and silk tassels.

original: de nas thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i rtsa ba'i thig gi phyi rol du gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs kun du cha bcu gnyis bcu gnyis kyi gnas la thigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rtsig pa la sogs pa nas kra ma shi rsha'i bar gyis mnan te gnas so
analyzed: de nas thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i rtsa ba'i thig gi phyi rol du gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs kun du cha bcu gnyis bcu gnyis kyi gnas la thigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rtsig pa la sogs pa nas kra ma shi rsha'i bar gyis mnan te gnas so
translated: Then, outside the root lines of this mind mandala, in all directions of the speech mandala, in the locations of twelve cubits each, the speech mandala is suppressed by the mandala of the vajra fence and so on up to the kramaśīrṣa.

original: // de'i phyir rol du cha drug spangs te thig go //
analyzed: // de'i phyir rol du cha drug spangs te thig go //
translated: Outside of that, the line is six cubits away.

original: de las cha drug spangs par lha'i snam bu'i thig go //
analyzed: de las cha drug spangs par lha'i snam bu'i thig go //
translated: Outside of that, the line of the ledge of the gods is six cubits away.

original: snam bu de las padma cha bzhi pa ste 'on kyang phyogs la gnas pa rnams thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rta babs kyi rtsegs gnyis pa'i ma da aa par na dang ka ba gnyis kyi cha phyed phyed pa bsal la cha bzhi'i gnas la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: snam bu de las padma cha bzhi pa ste 'on kyang phyogs la gnas pa rnams thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rta babs kyi rtsegs gnyis pa'i ma da aa par na dang ka ba gnyis kyi cha phyed phyed pa bsal la cha bzhi'i gnas la dgod par bya'o //
translated: From that cloth, a four-part lotus, but the parts that are in the directions are the two half-parts of the madāpaṇa and the two pillars of the second tier of the portico of the mind maṇḍala.

original: lha mo rnams med na snga ma ltar ro //
analyzed: lha mo rnams med na snga ma ltar ro //
translated: If there are no goddesses, it is as before.

original: de nas lha rnams kyi snam bu las cha gcig dpangs la rtsa ba'i thig go //
analyzed: de nas lha rnams kyi snam bu las cha gcig dpangs la rtsa ba'i thig go //
translated: Then, from the goddesses’ cloth, one part is the height of the basic line.

original: de yang thig gsum zur thig gi bar du'o //
analyzed: de yang thig gsum zur thig gi bar du'o //
translated: Moreover, three lines are up to the corner lines.

original: rtsa ba'i thig las tshangs thig ngag gis g-yas g-yon gyi cha drug drug bsubs bas sgo rnams so //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i thig las tshangs thig ngag gis g-yas g-yon gyi cha drug drug bsubs bas sgo rnams so //
translated: From the basic line, the Brahmā lines are the six parts to the right and left of the door.

original: de nas sgo khyud la sogs pa rta babs kyi par rnams thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo khyud la sogs pa'i nyis 'gyur gyi tshad kyis so //
analyzed: de nas sgo khyud la sogs pa rta babs kyi par rnams thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo khyud la sogs pa'i nyis 'gyur gyi tshad kyis so //
translated: Then, the portico, and so on, and the parts of the pediments are the size of the double of the portico, and so on, of the mind maṇḍala.

original: gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi rtsa ba'i thig gi phyi rol du sku'i dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi rtsa ba'i thig gi phyi rol du sku'i dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The body maṇḍala is outside the basic line of the speech maṇḍala.

original: de'i phyogs kun du cha nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i gnas la gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi rtsig pa la sogs pa kra ma sharshi'i bar gyis mnan te gnas so //
analyzed: de'i phyogs kun du cha nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i gnas la gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi rtsig pa la sogs pa kra ma sharshi'i bar gyis mnan te gnas so //
translated: In all directions of that [mandala], the walls of the maṇḍala of speech and so on are suppressed by the twenty-four locations with kramaśreṣṭhā.

original: de'i phyi rol du cha bcu spangs te thig go //
analyzed: de'i phyi rol du cha bcu spangs te thig go //
translated: Outside of that, having abandoned ten parts, [make] a line.

original: de nas lha rnams kyi snam bu'i thig cha bcu gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de nas lha rnams kyi snam bu'i thig cha bcu gnyis pa'o //
translated: Then, the line of the wall of the gods is twelve parts.

original: lha'i snam bu la padma bcu gnyis te /
analyzed: lha'i snam bu la padma bcu gnyis te /
translated: There are twelve lotuses on the wall of the gods.

original: so so la cha bcu gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: so so la cha bcu gnyis pa'o //
translated: Each one is twelve parts.

original: de ltar de rnams cha bdun dang ldan par byas la dbus kyi cha la lte ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar de rnams cha bdun dang ldan par byas la dbus kyi cha la lte ba'o //
translated: Having made those endowed with seven parts, the center is the navel.

original: dang po rnams 'dab ma bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: dang po rnams 'dab ma bzhi pa'o //
translated: The first ones have four petals.

original: gnyis pa rnams 'dab ma brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa rnams 'dab ma brgyad pa'o //
translated: The second ones have eight petals.

original: gsum pa rnams 'dab ma bcu drug pa'o //
analyzed: gsum pa rnams 'dab ma bcu drug pa'o //
translated: The third ones have sixteen petals.

original: de ltar gsum pa la 'dab ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
analyzed: de ltar gsum pa la 'dab ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
translated: Thus, the third [has] twenty-eight petals.

original: lha rnams kyi snam bu'i thig las cha gnyis pa spangs pa rtsa ba'i thig ste thig gsum zur @127b gyi bar ro //
analyzed: lha rnams kyi snam bu'i thig las cha gnyis pa spangs pa rtsa ba'i thig ste thig gsum zur @127b gyi bar ro //
translated: The line of the wall of the gods is two parts. Having abandoned the second, [make] the basic line, which is the line of the three corners.

original: rtsa ba'i thig las tshangs pa'i thig gi g-yas dang g-yon rnams su cha bcu gnyis snga ma ltar gsungs pa'i sgo'i tshad do //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i thig las tshangs pa'i thig gi g-yas dang g-yon rnams su cha bcu gnyis snga ma ltar gsungs pa'i sgo'i tshad do //
translated: From the basic lines, to the right and left of the Brahmā line, twelve parts as before are said to be the measure of the door.

original: de nas sgo khyud la sogs pa rta babs kyi mthar thug pa gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo khyud la sogs pa'i nyis 'gyur kyi  tshad do //
analyzed: de nas sgo khyud la sogs pa rta babs kyi mthar thug pa gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo khyud la sogs pa'i nyis 'gyur kyi  tshad do //
translated: Then, the measure of the doorjambs, etc., up to the pediments is double the measure of the doorjambs, etc., of the speech maṇḍala.

original: gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi rta babs kyi phyi rol du sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang rnams su cha bcu gnyis la shing rta gnas so //
analyzed: gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi rta babs kyi phyi rol du sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang rnams su cha bcu gnyis la shing rta gnas so //
translated: Outside the pediments of the speech maṇḍala, in the inner space of the body maṇḍala, there are twelve parts for the chariot.

original: de nas padma'i dkyil 'khor la cha nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: de nas padma'i dkyil 'khor la cha nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
translated: Then, the lotus maṇḍala has twenty-four parts.

original: de nas sa'i dkyil 'khor la cha bcu gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de nas sa'i dkyil 'khor la cha bcu gnyis pa'o //
translated: Then, the earth maṇḍala has twelve parts.

original: de nas chu dang me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnams la cha nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: de nas chu dang me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnams la cha nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
translated: Then, the maṇḍalas of water, fire, and wind have twenty-four parts.

original: nam mkha' dkyil 'khor la cha bcu gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' dkyil 'khor la cha bcu gnyis pa'o //
translated: The space maṇḍala has twelve parts.

original: de nas me ri'i dkyil 'khor la cha nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: de nas me ri'i dkyil 'khor la cha nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
translated: Then, the maṇḍala of the ring of fire has twenty-four parts.

original: de ltar padma'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa dkyil 'khor bdun rnams rim pa bzhin bskor ba ni me ri'i phyi'i bar du lte ba'i phur bu la btags te de ltar brgyad do //
analyzed: de ltar padma'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa dkyil 'khor bdun rnams rim pa bzhin bskor ba ni me ri'i phyi'i bar du lte ba'i phur bu la btags te de ltar brgyad do //
translated: Thus, the seven maṇḍalas, such as the lotus maṇḍala, are drawn in sequence.

original: gal te de ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bri ba ma grub na dbang gi don du thugs kyi dkyil 'khor tsam bka' stsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te de ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bri ba ma grub na dbang gi don du thugs kyi dkyil 'khor tsam bka' stsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If one is unable to draw the complete maṇḍala, it is said that the mind maṇḍala alone is sufficient for the purpose of empowerment.

original: de yang dbang gi don rnams dkyil 'khor gyi don du rigs kyi dbang las phyi'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu bral bar 'gyur zhes so //
analyzed: de yang dbang gi don rnams dkyil 'khor gyi don du rigs kyi dbang las phyi'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu bral bar 'gyur zhes so //
translated: Moreover, the purposes of empowerment are the purposes of the maṇḍala, and due to the empowerment of the family, one becomes fully qualified for the outer maṇḍala.

original: yang de bzhin du sgo la /
analyzed: yang de bzhin du sgo la /
translated: Again, in the same way, in the doorway,

original: hi yig las byung khro bo'i lte ba yis //
analyzed: hi yig las byung khro bo'i lte ba yis //
translated: the wrathful one arisen from the syllable hīḥ

original: zhes pa'i bka' stsal gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi cha byad la bzung ste /
analyzed: zhes pa'i bka' stsal gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi cha byad la bzung ste /
translated: is the statement of the Blessed One, understood to be the form of the Bhagavān.

original: thar pa'i sgo sgrib pas rnam par bcing ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas g-yon dang g-yas kyi mig dag tu hi yig dag las zla ba dang nyi ma bskyed la khro bo'i lta bas thams cad du lta zhing hi:hi:zhes brjod cing rtsa ba'i thig sogs pa rang rang
analyzed: thar pa'i sgo sgrib pas rnam par bcing ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas g-yon dang g-yas kyi mig dag tu hi yig dag las zla ba dang nyi ma bskyed la khro bo'i lta bas thams cad du lta zhing hi:hi:zhes brjod cing rtsa ba'i thig sogs pa rang rang
translated: Having the intention of being bound by the obscurations to the door of liberation, one should generate the moon and sun from the two syllables hi in the left and right eyes, and looking everywhere with the wrathful gaze, one should say hi hi.

original: gi shes rab kyis brtags la dbyi bar bya'o //
analyzed: gi shes rab kyis brtags la dbyi bar bya'o //
translated: One should remove the faults of the thread by examining it with one's wisdom.

original: de nas gtor ma dang mchod pa la sogs pa sngon du song ba dang / aom a'a:h'um badzra mu: zhes pas ye shes kyi thig gshegs su gsol ba ni nam mkha' la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kar ro //
analyzed: de nas gtor ma dang mchod pa la sogs pa sngon du song ba dang / aom a'a:h'um badzra mu: zhes pas ye shes kyi thig gshegs su gsol ba ni nam mkha' la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kar ro //
translated: Then, after having performed the bali offering, the offerings, and so on, one should request the departure of the gnosis thread with oṃ āḥ hūṃ vajra muḥ, into the heart of the tathāgatas residing in the sky.

original: kha dog lnga'i skud pa gnas gang yang rung bar gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: kha dog lnga'i skud pa gnas gang yang rung bar gzhag par bya'o //
translated: One should place the thread of five colors in any location.

original: 'di ni thig gang ga pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o /
analyzed: 'di ni thig gang ga pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o /
translated: This is the procedure of the thread-cross ritual.

original: // / de nas gtor ma dang mchod pa la sogs pa bya ste /
analyzed: // / de nas gtor ma dang mchod pa la sogs pa bya ste /
translated: Then, one should perform the bali offering, the offerings, and so on.

original: aa aam ram au li'i sa bon rnams las rdzogs pa'i tshon gyi bye brag kha dog lnga rnam pa rim pa bzhin du /
analyzed: aa aam ram au li'i sa bon rnams las rdzogs pa'i tshon gyi bye brag kha dog lnga rnam pa rim pa bzhin du /
translated: From the seeds of the colors, a aḥ raṃ u la, the colors of the perfect colors are of five colors, in sequence.

original: aom a'a:h'um ho ham ksha: rnams las rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du bsgoms la nam mkha' la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi @128a * //
analyzed: aom a'a:h'um ho ham ksha: rnams las rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du bsgoms la nam mkha' la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi @128a * //
translated: From the oṃ āḥ hūṃ ho haṃ kṣaḥ, meditate on the nature of the perfect buddhas, Vairocana, and so on.

original: thugs ka nas aom yig la sogs pa las yongs sa su rdzogs pa'i ye shes kyi tshon rnams skud pa sbyang ba'i dus ltar bkug ste gzhug go //
analyzed: thugs ka nas aom yig la sogs pa las yongs sa su rdzogs pa'i ye shes kyi tshon rnams skud pa sbyang ba'i dus ltar bkug ste gzhug go //
translated: From the hearts of all the tathāgatas abiding in the sky, the wisdom threads of the perfect colors are drawn, like the time of purifying the thread, and are inserted.🔽Those together become of one taste.

original: de dang bcas pa ro gcig tu gyur pa ye shes kyi tshon de rnams la aom yig la sogs pa'i sngags brjod nas yang /
analyzed: de dang bcas pa ro gcig tu gyur pa ye shes kyi tshon de rnams la aom yig la sogs pa'i sngags brjod nas yang /
translated: Recite the oṃ and so on of those wisdom colors and again:

original: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um /
translated: oṃ vajra citra samaya hūṃ.

original: zhes pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so //
analyzed: zhes pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so //
translated: Recite the mantra one hundred and eight times.

original: de ltar 'bar ba'i lta stangs kyis so so la hi yig bkod de yang dag par sbyar ro //
analyzed: de ltar 'bar ba'i lta stangs kyis so so la hi yig bkod de yang dag par sbyar ro //
translated: In that way, with the gaze of blazing, the hi syllables are placed in each and are perfectly applied.

original: yang aom ram dzo ba hu la ye na satvan stva buddha shtsa bha ga w'a na ta:/
analyzed: yang aom ram dzo ba hu la ye na satvan stva buddha shtsa bha ga w'a na ta:/
translated: Oṃ raṃ jvālākula satvaṃ satva buddhaśca bhagavāna taḥ,

original: satva r'a g'a nu rakta ste na sa tye nas ra dzo dzva la tu /
analyzed: satva r'a g'a nu rakta ste na sa tye nas ra dzo dzva la tu /
translated: satva rāgānurāgaṃ tena satyena rajo jvālātu.

original: zhes pa'i bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sbar bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'i bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sbar bar bya'o //
translated: One should ignite it with the consecration of truth.

original: de nyid lha'i rnal 'byor gyi dka' thub kyis 'bar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid lha'i rnal 'byor gyi dka' thub kyis 'bar bar bya'o //
translated: One should ignite it with the austerity of deity yoga.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i dbus su h'um zhes pa'i sngags brjod cing gdon par bya zhing rang gi lag pa'i rdo rje la blos thim par bsam mo //
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i dbus su h'um zhes pa'i sngags brjod cing gdon par bya zhing rang gi lag pa'i rdo rje la blos thim par bsam mo //
translated: Then, in the center of the maṇḍala, one should recite the mantra hūṃ and cast it, imagining that it dissolves into the vajra in one’s hand.

original: khung bu tshon sna lnga yis dgang bar byas pa dang / dril bu dkrol zhing rdo rje'i glu blangs te ;
analyzed: khung bu tshon sna lnga yis dgang bar byas pa dang / dril bu dkrol zhing rdo rje'i glu blangs te ;
translated: The hole is filled with five-colored powder, a bell is rung, and the vajra song is sung:

original: mtshan ma ngan pa bcom nas /
analyzed: mtshan ma ngan pa bcom nas /
translated: Having conquered inauspicious signs,

original: 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste //
analyzed: 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste //
translated: this is the pure realm of phenomena,

original: sems can khams rnams rab tu sgrol //
analyzed: sems can khams rnams rab tu sgrol //
translated: liberating the realms of sentient beings.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po khyod //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po khyod //
translated: You, the king of vajra holders,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
translated: the place of all tathāgatas,

original: nyes pa thams cad rnam par grol //
analyzed: nyes pa thams cad rnam par grol //
translated: liberated from all faults,

original: 'khor lo'i dbus su yang dag gnas //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i dbus su yang dag gnas //
translated: And in the center of the wheel, the perfect one.

original: de ltar chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag par bsgoms nas /
analyzed: de ltar chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag par bsgoms nas /
translated: Having thus meditated on the utterly pure dharmadhātu,

original: dang por dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsdad la lag pa g-yon pa rdo rje 'chang bar byas la /
analyzed: dang por dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsdad la lag pa g-yon pa rdo rje 'chang bar byas la /
translated: first sit in the center of the maṇḍala, hold the vajra in the left hand,

original: aom badzra ram ga sa ma ya h'um zhes pa'am /
analyzed: aom badzra ram ga sa ma ya h'um zhes pa'am /
translated: recite oṃ vajra rakṣa samaya hūṃ,

original: yi ge drug pa brjod cing byang shar mtshams nas brtsams te shar du kha phyogs pas ra ba gsum bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: yi ge drug pa brjod cing byang shar mtshams nas brtsams te shar du kha phyogs pas ra ba gsum bri bar bya'o //
translated: or recite the six-syllable [mantra], and beginning from the northeast corner, facing east, draw the three enclosures.

original: de yang / sbom pos nad byed pa dang re kh'a ngan dang phra bas rdzas rnams 'bri bar rab tu gsal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de yang / sbom pos nad byed pa dang re kh'a ngan dang phra bas rdzas rnams 'bri bar rab tu gsal bar 'gyur //

analyzed: byang du padma dkar po rnams so //

original: nub tu 'khor lo ser po rnams so //
analyzed: nub tu 'khor lo ser po rnams so //

analyzed: padma la gnas pa'i bum pa brgyad po dkar po padma'i 'dab ma la kha phyogs pa'o //

analyzed: ra ba gsum ni dkar po dang / dmar po dang / nag po rnams so //

analyzed: ra ba de rnams kyi sa'i cha dgu las cha re re dor te cha gnyis la ra ba'o //
translated: For each of the nine sections of the ground of those fences, one section is left out, and two sections are for the fence.

original: sgo khyud rnams su rin po che rdo rjes sbras pa'o //
analyzed: sgo khyud rnams su rin po che rdo rjes sbras pa'o //
translated: The gateways are inlaid with jewels and vajras.

original: rta babs rnams kha dog sna tshogs pa'a  //
analyzed: rta babs rnams kha dog sna tshogs pa'a  //
