translated: One should recite the mantras of the retinue twenty-one times each and the hundred-syllable mantra.

original: gsung bar 'gyur ba'i cho gas 'byung po thams cad la gtor ma sbyin ba ni /
analyzed: gsung bar 'gyur ba'i cho gas 'byung po thams cad la gtor ma sbyin ba ni /
translated: The offering of torma to all the bhūtas is done with the ritual of the proclamation.

original: phyogs rnams na gnas pa'i sgrub pa po'i grogs mchod dkyil 'khor srung du bcug la phyi rol du song la khro bo la sogs pa la gtor ma sbyin no //
analyzed: phyogs rnams na gnas pa'i sgrub pa po'i grogs mchod dkyil 'khor srung du bcug la phyi rol du song la khro bo la sogs pa la gtor ma sbyin no //
translated: Having placed the friends of the adept who are in the directions in the mandala to guard it, one should go outside and give sacrificial cakes to the wrathful ones, and so forth.

original: de nas cho ga lhag chad la sogs pa'i skyon zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gsung bar 'gyur ba'i cho gas zhib dang rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg slob mas byas te /
analyzed: de nas cho ga lhag chad la sogs pa'i skyon zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gsung bar 'gyur ba'i cho gas zhib dang rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg slob mas byas te /
translated: Then, in order to pacify the faults of omissions and additions in the rite, the disciple should perform the extensive and brief burnt offerings according to the rite that will be explained.

original: med par gyur na rang nyid kyis so //
analyzed: med par gyur na rang nyid kyis so //
translated: If that is not possible, one should do it oneself.

original: rdo rje shugs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas me tog gi phreng ba'i sngags dang rkang pa bcu drug pa bzlos shing rdo rje gsor dril bu dkrol zhing shar sgo'i slob dpon dang stabs cig tu lan gsum du bskor ba bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje shugs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas me tog gi phreng ba'i sngags dang rkang pa bcu drug pa bzlos shing rdo rje gsor dril bu dkrol zhing shar sgo'i slob dpon dang stabs cig tu lan gsum du bskor ba bya'o //
translated: Endowed with the meditative absorption of the vajra impulse, reciting the mantra of the flower garland and the sixteen-line mantra, shaking the vajra and ringing the bell, one should circumambulate the mandala three times together with the master of the eastern gate.

original: dkyil 'khor la bltas te gtso bo la me tog gi phreng ba phul la /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor la bltas te gtso bo la me tog gi phreng ba phul la /
translated: Looking at the mandala, one should offer the flower garland to the principal deity.

original: aom badzra audgha ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra audgha ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya h'um /
translated: Oṃ vajra udghataya samaya praveśaya hūṃ.

original: zhes pa'i sngags kyis sgo bzhi phye bar bsams la /
analyzed: zhes pa'i sngags kyis sgo bzhi phye bar bsams la /
translated: Having imagined that the four doors are opened by this mantra,

original: aom sa ma ya pra be sha ya mi zhes pa brjod de /
analyzed: aom sa ma ya pra be sha ya mi zhes pa brjod de /
translated: one should recite: “Oṃ, may the Samaya be opened for me.”

original: slar yang me tog gi phreng ba gar bya zhing blangs nas @132b rang gi mgo la gzhag go //
analyzed: slar yang me tog gi phreng ba gar bya zhing blangs nas @132b rang gi mgo la gzhag go //
translated: Again, one should take up the flower garland with a dance, and place it on one’s own head.

original: 'khor lo la phyag byas te sems can la dngos grub thams cad kyi bka' drin byin cig pas gsol ba gdab pa ste /
analyzed: 'khor lo la phyag byas te sems can la dngos grub thams cad kyi bka' drin byin cig pas gsol ba gdab pa ste /
translated: Having bowed to the wheel, one should request the favor of all powers for sentient beings.

original: 'di ni dkyil 'khor rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dkyil 'khor rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the procedure for the consecration of the maṇḍala.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor la mchod pa byas la /🔽de'i phyi rol du legs par brtags pa'i nga rgyal la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i dge bsnyen la sogs pa bslab pa la gnas pa /
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor la mchod pa byas la / de'i phyi rol du legs par brtags pa'i nga rgyal la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i dge bsnyen la sogs pa bslab pa la gnas pa /
translated: Then, having made offerings to the maṇḍala,🔽outside of it one should admit the students who are free of the faults of pride and so forth, who are lay vow holders and so forth, who are established in the trainings,

original: thos pa la sogs pa'i pha rol du song ba theg pa chen po'i sdom pa la mos pa rigs dang yon tan med pa dang gzugs ngan pa'i slob ma rnams kyang gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: thos pa la sogs pa'i pha rol du song ba theg pa chen po'i sdom pa la mos pa rigs dang yon tan med pa dang gzugs ngan pa'i slob ma rnams kyang gzung bar bya'o //
translated: who have perfected learning and so forth, who are devoted to the vows of the Mahāyāna, and who are free of faults of family and qualities, and who are not ugly.

original: gal te de nyid mchog tu dad pa dang ldan pa rdo rje sems dpa'i sdom ba la lhag par mos pa rdo rje theg pa la slob dpon gzhan la mi phyogs pa ste /
analyzed: gal te de nyid mchog tu dad pa dang ldan pa rdo rje sems dpa'i sdom ba la lhag par mos pa rdo rje theg pa la slob dpon gzhan la mi phyogs pa ste /
translated: If he is the very best, endowed with supreme faith, devoted to the vows of Vajrasattva, and not devoted to other masters of the Vajrayana,🔽then he should be initiated in the mandala of the Supreme Original Buddha.

original: de yang phyed dang bcas pa'i sum brgya las gsungs pa /
analyzed: de yang phyed dang bcas pa'i sum brgya las gsungs pa /
translated: This is stated in the Vajrapani Initiation Tantra:

original: so so'i bslab pa la gnas pa'i //
analyzed: so so'i bslab pa la gnas pa'i //
translated: He should abide in the individual trainings,

original: theg pa che la lhag par mos //🔽'khor rnams bzhi po ma lus pa //
analyzed: theg pa che la lhag par mos // 'khor rnams bzhi po ma lus pa //
translated: and be devoted to the Mahayana.🔽Even if he is ugly, has no good qualities,

original: gzugs ngan yon tan med pa dang // dman par gyur kyang dkyil 'khor gyi //
analyzed: gzugs ngan yon tan med pa dang // dman par gyur kyang dkyil 'khor gyi //
translated: or is of low caste, he should be accepted

original: cho gas rjes gzung lhag gnas bya //🔽zhes pas so //
analyzed: cho gas rjes gzung lhag gnas bya // zhes pas so //
translated: through the mandala ritual and made to perform the preparatory rite.

original: de ltar slob ma gcig gam gnyis sam mang por gyur pa rnams mandala byas pa dang pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs la me tog snyim par bzung ste /
analyzed: de ltar slob ma gcig gam gnyis sam mang por gyur pa rnams mandala byas pa dang pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs la me tog snyim par bzung ste /
translated: Thus, whether there is one disciple, two, or many, they should make a mandala, kneel with both knees on the ground, and hold flowers in their joined palms.🔽For the sake of happiness in this world🔽and for the sake of happiness in the next world,

original: 'jig rten 'di la bde don dang // 'jig rten pha rol bde don dang // 'on kyang sangs rgyas thob don du //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di la bde don dang // 'jig rten pha rol bde don dang // 'on kyang sangs rgyas thob don du //
translated: and also for the sake of attaining buddhahood,

original: blo dang ldan pa 'jug par bya //
analyzed: blo dang ldan pa 'jug par bya //
translated: the wise one should enter.

original: zhes pa'i don go bar byas la rang gi kha nas gzhug cing rdo rje'i lam nas shes rab kyi padmar gnas pa la rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las spros pas shes rab dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams zhal nas zhugs te /
analyzed: zhes pa'i don go bar byas la rang gi kha nas gzhug cing rdo rje'i lam nas shes rab kyi padmar gnas pa la rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las spros pas shes rab dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams zhal nas zhugs te /
translated: The tathāgatas together with the goddesses enter through one’s mouth and melt into bodhicitta at the heart.

original: byang chub kyi sems su zhu nas dbang bskur bar bsams la /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems su zhu nas dbang bskur bar bsams la /
translated: One should imagine that they confer the empowerment.

original: de dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgor gnas pas 'jug pa'i gsol ba gdab pa ni /
analyzed: de dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgor gnas pas 'jug pa'i gsol ba gdab pa ni /
translated: One should recite the supplication for entry while standing at the eastern door of the maṇḍala:🔽“You deliver me from the ocean of samsara🔽that is terrifying with birth, aging, death,

original: skye dang rga dang 'chi ba dang // chu srin la sogs 'jigs pa yi //🔽'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las 'don khyod //
analyzed: skye dang rga dang 'chi ba dang // chu srin la sogs 'jigs pa yi // 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las 'don khyod //
translated: crocodiles, and so on.

original: nga la ston pa mgon po che //
analyzed: nga la ston pa mgon po che //
translated: “You are my teacher, great protector.

original: bde ba chen por bdag 'tshal bas //
analyzed: bde ba chen por bdag 'tshal bas //
translated: Since I seek great bliss,

original: byang chub chen po'i lam bstan pa //
analyzed: byang chub chen po'i lam bstan pa //
translated: please teach me the path of great awakening.

original: dam tshig de ni bdag la stsol //
analyzed: dam tshig de ni bdag la stsol //
translated: Please grant me the sacred pledge.

original: byang chub sems kyang bdag la byin //🔽sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyang bdag la byin // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
translated: Please give me bodhicitta.

original: skyabs gsum rnams kyang bdag la stsol //
analyzed: skyabs gsum rnams kyang bdag la stsol //
translated: Please give me the three refuges:🔽the Buddha, the dharma, and the sangha.”

original: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
analyzed: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
translated: I, the protector, will lead you

original: mgon po bdag ni gzhug tu gsal //🔽zhes brjod la /
analyzed: mgon po bdag ni gzhug tu gsal // zhes brjod la /
translated: into the supreme city of great freedom.

original: de nas slob ma gcig gtso bor byas te /🔽@133a * // bu tshur theg pa chen po yi //
analyzed: de nas slob ma gcig gtso bor byas te / @133a * // bu tshur theg pa chen po yi //
translated: Then, taking one of the disciples as the main one,🔽“Come, child.🔽You who are setting out on the great path

original: lam chen la ni chas pa po //🔽sngags kyi spyod pa cho ga'i lam //
analyzed: lam chen la ni chas pa po // sngags kyi spyod pa cho ga'i lam //
translated: of the Great Vehicle,🔽I will explain to you the path of the ritual

original: khyod la yang dag bshad par bya //
analyzed: khyod la yang dag bshad par bya //
translated: of the conduct of mantra.

original: dus gsum la gnas sangs rgyas rnams //
analyzed: dus gsum la gnas sangs rgyas rnams //
translated: The buddhas abiding in the three times

original: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
translated: have the vajra of body, speech, and mind.

original: sngags kyi nus pa 'di nyid kyis //
analyzed: sngags kyi nus pa 'di nyid kyis //
translated: Through the power of mantra,

original: mnyam pa med pa'i ye shes thob //
analyzed: mnyam pa med pa'i ye shes thob //
translated: they attain unequaled wisdom.

original: sngags kyi sbyor ba mnyam med pas //
analyzed: sngags kyi sbyor ba mnyam med pas //
translated: Through the unequaled application of mantra,

original: sh'akya seng ge la sogs kyis //🔽bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa //
analyzed: sh'akya seng ge la sogs kyis // bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa //
translated: the Lion of the Śākyas and others🔽overcame the great power

original: stobs chen dag kyang de yis bcom //
analyzed: stobs chen dag kyang de yis bcom //
translated: of the terrible hordes of demons.

original: 'jig rten pa rnams bsgral pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa rnams bsgral pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to liberate worldly beings,

original: 'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das //
analyzed: 'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das //
translated: they turned the wheel and passed into nirvāṇa.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa thob bya'i phyir //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa thob bya'i phyir //
translated: In order to attain omniscience,

original: blo gros ldan pas de ltar mdzod //
analyzed: blo gros ldan pas de ltar mdzod //
translated: the wise ones should do likewise.

original: zhes pa'i don go bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'i don go bar bya'o //
translated: Understand the meaning of this.

original: dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi //
translated: I go for refuge to the Three Jewels.

original: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
analyzed: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
translated: I confess each and every misdeed.

original: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
translated: I rejoice in the virtue of beings.

original: sangs rgyas byang chub sems bskyed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub sems bskyed do //
translated: I generate the awakening mind.🔽Recite this three times.

original: zhes lan gsum brjod la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol //
analyzed: zhes lan gsum brjod la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol //
translated: All buddhas and bodhisattvas, please consider me.

original: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas /
analyzed: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas /
translated: I, by the name so-and-so, from this time forward

original: ji srid snying po byang chub ma thob kyi bar du /
analyzed: ji srid snying po byang chub ma thob kyi bar du /
translated: until the heart of awakening is reached,

original: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
analyzed: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
translated: just as the lords of the three times

original: byang chub la ni nges mdzad ltar //
analyzed: byang chub la ni nges mdzad ltar //
translated: have definitely gone to awakening,🔽I too will generate

original: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
translated: the unsurpassable, supreme awakening mind.

original: dam pa mchog ni bskyed par bgyi //
analyzed: dam pa mchog ni bskyed par bgyi //
translated: I will firmly take up the three kinds of ethics:🔽the ethics of learning, the ethics of gathering virtue,

original: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //🔽bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum // bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi //
translated: and the ethics of working for beings.🔽I will take up the three kinds of ethics.

original: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams //
analyzed: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams //
translated: I go for refuge to the Buddha,

original: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
translated: The unsurpassed Three Jewels

original: sangs rgyas sdom pa la byung ba //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sdom pa la byung ba //
translated: Arise from the Buddha’s vows.

original: dus 'di nas ni gzung bar bgyi //
analyzed: dus 'di nas ni gzung bar bgyi //
translated: From this time forward, I will uphold them.🔽And:

original: zhes pa dang / rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya bla ma rnams te 'dod pa'i rdo rje rnams ni spyi bor gzung bar bgyi //
analyzed: zhes pa dang / rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya bla ma rnams te 'dod pa'i rdo rje rnams ni spyi bor gzung bar bgyi //
translated: The vajra, bell, and mudra, and the gurus, the vajras of desire, I will uphold on the crown of my head.

original: rin chen rigs su 'dir ni sbyin pa sbyin bya 'khor lor rgyal ba mchog gi dam tshig bskyang bar bya //
analyzed: rin chen rigs su 'dir ni sbyin pa sbyin bya 'khor lor rgyal ba mchog gi dam tshig bskyang bar bya //
translated: Here, in the jewel family, I will give gifts, and in the wheel, I will keep the supreme victor’s vows.

original: ral gri'i rigs su mchod pa bya ste gsal bar chu skyes rigs su sdom pa yang dag bskyang bar bya //
analyzed: ral gri'i rigs su mchod pa bya ste gsal bar chu skyes rigs su sdom pa yang dag bskyang bar bya //
translated: In the sword family, I will make offerings, and in the lotus family, I will keep the vows clearly.

original: sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i rgyu ru rgyal ba skyed byed rigs su byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i rgyu ru rgyal ba skyed byed rigs su byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi //
translated: In the family that produces the victors, the cause of sentient beings’ liberation, I will generate the awakening mind.🔽And:🔽I will liberate those not liberated,

original: zhes pa dang / ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral ba dang // ma grol ba rnams grol bar bgyi //
analyzed: zhes pa dang / ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral ba dang // ma grol ba rnams grol bar bgyi //
translated: I will free those not freed.

original: dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing //🔽sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
analyzed: dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing // sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
translated: I will give breath to those not breathed on,

original: ces pa yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: ces pa yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: And I will place sentient beings in nirvana.

original: de nas yi ge drug gis bsrungs la /
analyzed: de nas yi ge drug gis bsrungs la /
translated: Then, having protected with the six syllables,

original: de'i snying ga dang @133b mgrin pa dang dpral ba rnams la sgra gcan dang / nyi ma dang zla ba rnams la gnas pa nag po dang / dmar po dang dkar po'i h'um dang a'a: dang aom rnams rnam par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i snying ga dang @133b mgrin pa dang dpral ba rnams la sgra gcan dang / nyi ma dang zla ba rnams la gnas pa nag po dang / dmar po dang dkar po'i h'um dang a'a: dang aom rnams rnam par bsam par bya'o //
translated: one should imagine at his heart, throat, and forehead, respectively, Rāhu, the sun, and the moon, upon which are black, red, and white hūṃ, āḥ, and oṃ.

original: de rnams brjod cing snying ga dang mgrin pa dang dpral ba rnams la dri chu dang / me tog dang bcas pa'i rdo rjes reg la me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri dang mar me dang lha bshos rnams dbul lo //
analyzed: de rnams brjod cing snying ga dang mgrin pa dang dpral ba rnams la dri chu dang / me tog dang bcas pa'i rdo rjes reg la me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri dang mar me dang lha bshos rnams dbul lo //
translated: Reciting those, one should touch the heart, throat, and forehead with the vajra together with water for the mouth and flowers.

original: de nas au du mw'a ra la sogs pa'i so shing sor bcu gnyis pa /
analyzed: de nas au du mw'a ra la sogs pa'i so shing sor bcu gnyis pa /
translated: Then, a tooth stick of udumbara and so forth, twelve fingerbreadths long,

original: srog chags med pa 'khyogs pa ma yin pa /
analyzed: srog chags med pa 'khyogs pa ma yin pa /
translated: without living beings, not crooked,

original: pags pa ma bshus pa rma med pa /
analyzed: pags pa ma bshus pa rma med pa /
translated: not stripped of its bark, without wounds,

original: dri zhim po'i chus bkrus pa dang / steng gi cha la me tog bcings te /
analyzed: dri zhim po'i chus bkrus pa dang / steng gi cha la me tog bcings te /
translated: washed with fragrant water, and with a flower tied to the top,

original: slob ma kha shar du phyogs pa la sngags 'dis sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: slob ma kha shar du phyogs pa la sngags 'dis sbyin par bya'o //
translated: one should give to the disciple facing east with this mantra.

original: aom a'a: hum ho ham ksha: badzra danta k'a shtha tsa tur bi mo ksha mu kha bi shuddhi sva bh'a wa k'a ya b'a ka tsi tta dzny'ana mu kha dant'a a'a di ma lam bi sho dha ya bi sho dha ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom a'a: hum ho ham ksha: badzra danta k'a shtha tsa tur bi mo ksha mu kha bi shuddhi sva bh'a wa k'a ya b'a ka tsi tta dzny'ana mu kha dant'a a'a di ma lam bi sho dha ya bi sho dha ya sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ āḥ hūṃ ho haṃ kṣaḥ vajra-danta-kāṣṭha-catur-vimokṣa-mukha-viśuddhi-svabhāva-kāya-vāk-citta-jñāna-mukha-danta-ādīna-malaviśodhaya viśodhaya svāhā.

original: zhes pas te de yang gru bzhi pa khru bzhi dang ldan pa la /🔽ba lang gi lci ba la sogs pas byugs pa'i mandala la aom a'a: h'um /
analyzed: zhes pas te de yang gru bzhi pa khru bzhi dang ldan pa la / ba lang gi lci ba la sogs pas byugs pa'i mandala la aom a'a: h'um /
translated: Moreover, in a square [maṇḍala] four cubits in size,🔽one should smear the maṇḍala with cow dung and so forth, and recite Oṃ āḥ hūṃ seven times.

original: zhes pa lan bdun brjod nas so la brud de bskyur ro //
analyzed: zhes pa lan bdun brjod nas so la brud de bskyur ro //
translated: Then, having chewed the tooth stick, one should spit it out.

original: so shing mandala la lhung ba de gang du phyogs kyi dbye bas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: so shing mandala la lhung ba de gang du phyogs kyi dbye bas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub brtag par bya'o //
translated: One should examine the tooth stick that has fallen on the maṇḍala, and by the division of the direction, one should examine the siddhi that will arise.

original: mandala gyi phyir song na dngos grub med do //
analyzed: mandala gyi phyir song na dngos grub med do //
translated: If it goes outside the maṇḍala, there is no siddhi.

original: de nas dri zhim po'i chu bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pas khyor ba gsum blud pa ni /
analyzed: de nas dri zhim po'i chu bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pas khyor ba gsum blud pa ni /
translated: Then, one should drink three handfuls of fragrant water together with the five nectars.

original: aom hr'i: bi shuddha dharmm'a sarba p'a p'a ni ts'a sya sho dha ya sarba bi ka la p'a na aa pa na ya h'um zhes brjod pas so //
analyzed: aom hr'i: bi shuddha dharmm'a sarba p'a p'a ni ts'a sya sho dha ya sarba bi ka la p'a na aa pa na ya h'um zhes brjod pas so //
translated: Recite Om hrīḥ viśuddha dharma sarva pāpa nam ci tasyā śodhaya sarva vikalpā pāna apanaya hūṃ.

original: de nas mnyam par gzhag pa la nye bar gnas te /🔽h'um las byung ba'i ku sha steng gi cha mnyam pa la de nyid dang yi ge drug pa bzlas pa ni stan gyi don du'o //
analyzed: de nas mnyam par gzhag pa la nye bar gnas te / h'um las byung ba'i ku sha steng gi cha mnyam pa la de nyid dang yi ge drug pa bzlas pa ni stan gyi don du'o //
translated: Then, remaining in equipoise,🔽from hūṃ, the kuśa grass, on the upper part, the same and the six syllables are recited for the purpose of the seat.

original: de ltar yang sngas kyi don du dh'i: las byung ba de nyid dang / yi ge drug pa bzlas so ;
analyzed: de ltar yang sngas kyi don du dh'i: las byung ba de nyid dang / yi ge drug pa bzlas so ;
translated: In the same way, for the purpose of the pillow, from dhiḥ, the same and the six syllables are recited.

original: / de yang aom badzra t'i kshna zhes pa brjod la sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: / de yang aom badzra t'i kshna zhes pa brjod la sbyin par bya'o //
translated: Recite Om vajra tiksna and give it.

original: de nas skud pa dmar po sum sgril h'um las byung ba la de nyid dang yi ge drug pa bzlas te /
analyzed: de nas skud pa dmar po sum sgril h'um las byung ba la de nyid dang yi ge drug pa bzlas te /
translated: Then, from hūṃ, the red string, triple-twisted, the same and the six syllables are recited.

original: mdud pa gsum byas pa rgyud dang rgyud las gsungs pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis bcing ba ni /
analyzed: mdud pa gsum byas pa rgyud dang rgyud las gsungs pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis bcing ba ni /
translated: Having made three knots, the binding with the reasons stated in the tantras and the explanatory tantras is as follows:🔽 Recite Om buddha maitryaraksaraksasarpvanam svāhā.

original: aom buddha mee tri raksha ra ksha sarbba na sv'a h'a /🔽zhes brjod pas so //
analyzed: aom buddha mee tri raksha ra ksha sarbba na sv'a h'a /🔽zhes brjod pas so //
translated: Recite Om vajra tiksna and give it.🔽 Then, from hūṃ, the red string, triple-twisted, the same and the six syllables are recited.🔽Having made three knots, the binding with the reasons stated in the tantras and the explanatory tantras is as follows:

original: de nas dpral ba dang / mgrin pa dang / snying ga dang / lte ba dang / gsang ba dang / gtsug tor rnams su aom a'a: h'um ho ham ksha:/
analyzed: de nas dpral ba dang / mgrin pa dang / snying ga dang / lte ba dang / gsang ba dang / gtsug tor rnams su aom a'a: h'um ho ham ksha:/
translated: Then, on the forehead, throat, heart, navel, secret place, and crown, arrange the six families, Oṃ, Aḥ, Huṃ, Ha, Kṣa, and A.

original: zhes pa'i rigs drug rim pa bzhin bkod la sngags 'dis rdo rje sems dpa' bskul ba ste /
analyzed: zhes pa'i rigs drug rim pa bzhin bkod la sngags 'dis rdo rje sems dpa' bskul ba ste /
translated: With this mantra, Vajrasattva is invoked:

original: aom aa a'a aam aa: badzra sa tv'a ma h'a su kha badzra k'a la tsakra shi shya sya aa bhi mu kho bha ba sa na @134a * //
analyzed: aom aa a'a aam aa: badzra sa tv'a ma h'a su kha badzra k'a la tsakra shi shya sya aa bhi mu kho bha ba sa na @134a * //
translated: Oṃ, a, ā, am, aḥ, Vajrasattva, great bliss, Vajra Kala Cakra, of the disciple, may the face of the deity,

original: tushta bha ba /
analyzed: tushta bha ba /
translated: be satisfied,

original: wa ra do bha wa k'a ya b'a ka tsi tta aa dhi shth'a n'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /🔽zhes pas so //
analyzed: wa ra do bha wa k'a ya b'a ka tsi tta aa dhi shth'a n'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a / zhes pas so //
translated: become the body, speech, and mind, and perform the consecration, Kuru Kuru Svaha.

original: de nas 'khor ba la gnas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnyed par don te /
analyzed: de nas 'khor ba la gnas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnyed par don te /
translated: Then, in order to attain the qualities of a buddha by remaining in cyclic existence,

original: de thob pas sdug pa bsngal ma lus pa dang bral bar 'gyur zhes pas 'jigs pa las gzengs bstod pa ni /
analyzed: de thob pas sdug pa bsngal ma lus pa dang bral bar 'gyur zhes pas 'jigs pa las gzengs bstod pa ni /
translated: one is encouraged to be fearless, since by attaining that, one will be free from all suffering.

original: mngal du mngal gnas nyid dang skye ba'i dus dang byis pa'i rang bzhin rnams kyis mi bzad sdug bsngal lo //
analyzed: mngal du mngal gnas nyid dang skye ba'i dus dang byis pa'i rang bzhin rnams kyis mi bzad sdug bsngal lo //
translated: In the womb, in the state of being in the womb, at the time of birth, and in the nature of a child, there is unbearable suffering.

original: gzhon nu lang tsho dag la bud med nor dang bkra shis 'dod pas nyon mongs sdug bsngal chen pos gang //
analyzed: gzhon nu lang tsho dag la bud med nor dang bkra shis 'dod pas nyon mongs sdug bsngal chen pos gang //
translated: In youth, in the prime of life, women are filled with great suffering, desiring wealth and good fortune.

original: rga dang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal chen po dag ste slar yang du 'bong la sogs 'gro drug 'jigs ster ba //
analyzed: rga dang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal chen po dag ste slar yang du 'bong la sogs 'gro drug 'jigs ster ba //
translated: And the great suffering of old age and death, and again the terrors of the six destinies such as hell.

original: 'gro ba 'di rnams ma lus sgyu ma la rmongs gyur pas sdug bsngal ba las sdug bsngal 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'di rnams ma lus sgyu ma la rmongs gyur pas sdug bsngal ba las sdug bsngal 'gyur ba'o //
translated: All these beings, deluded by illusion, go from suffering to suffering.

original: 'khor ba'i nang nas gal te mi nyid dag tu gyur kyang chos kyi blo ni brgya lam zhig la'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i nang nas gal te mi nyid dag tu gyur kyang chos kyi blo ni brgya lam zhig la'o //
translated: If, within samsara, they become human, the thought of Dharma arises once in a hundred.

original: de las dge ba'i dbang gis sangs rgyas nyid la rjes chags gyur kyang dang po'i theg par rab tu 'jug / de las dpal ldan rdo rje'i theg pa dang ni ma lus snying po sgom pa'i blo 'jug brgya lam na'o //
analyzed: de las dge ba'i dbang gis sangs rgyas nyid la rjes chags gyur kyang dang po'i theg par rab tu 'jug / de las dpal ldan rdo rje'i theg pa dang ni ma lus snying po sgom pa'i blo 'jug brgya lam na'o //
translated: From that, by the power of virtue, they may become attached to buddhahood, but first they enter the vehicle. From that, the thought of meditating on the essence of the glorious vajra vehicle and all may enter once in a hundred.

original: de las sangs rgyas nyid de 'dod chags bde ba'i go 'phong la 'jug ae ma'o shin tu dka'o //🔽zhes pa dang / bskal ba bye ba grangs med par //
analyzed: de las sangs rgyas nyid de 'dod chags bde ba'i go 'phong la 'jug ae ma'o shin tu dka'o // zhes pa dang / bskal ba bye ba grangs med par //
translated: How difficult it is!🔽And:🔽Those who have previously committed misdeeds

original: gang gis sngon du sdig byas pa //
analyzed: gang gis sngon du sdig byas pa //
translated: For countless millions of eons,

original: dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra mthong ba yis //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra mthong ba yis //
translated: By seeing such a maṇḍala

original: de rnams ma lus zad par /🔽'gyur ; / gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la //
analyzed: de rnams ma lus zad par / 'gyur ; / gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la //
translated: All of those are exhausted without exception.🔽Those with extremely stainless intelligence

original: blo gros shin tu dri med pas //🔽sdug bsngal rnams la gnas pa yi //
analyzed: blo gros shin tu dri med pas // sdug bsngal rnams la gnas pa yi //
translated: In this supreme conduct,🔽Destroy rebirth in the lower realms

original: ngan song skye ba 'joms par byed //
analyzed: ngan song skye ba 'joms par byed //
translated: Of those who dwell in suffering.

original: bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis //
analyzed: bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis //
translated: You great beings

original: rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed //
analyzed: rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed //
translated: Have today obtained unequaled attainment.🔽You who have been fully accepted

original: gang zhig rgyal ba sras bcas pa //
analyzed: gang zhig rgyal ba sras bcas pa //
translated: By the victors and their heirs,

original: bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kyis ;🔽/ thams cad yongs su gzung bar gyis //🔽bdag nyid chen por bskyed pa des //🔽khyed rnams theg pa chen po la //
analyzed: bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kyis ; / thams cad yongs su gzung bar gyis // bdag nyid chen por bskyed pa des // khyed rnams theg pa chen po la //
translated: In this teaching,🔽By that which generates you as great beings,🔽You will proceed well

original: legs par bgrod par 'gyur ba yis //
analyzed: legs par bgrod par 'gyur ba yis //
translated: In the Great Vehicle.

original: de phyir 'di ni lam gyi mchog / theg chen 'byung ba'i gzhi yin pas //
analyzed: de phyir 'di ni lam gyi mchog / theg chen 'byung ba'i gzhi yin pas //
translated: the basis for the arising of the Great Vehicle.

original: gang zhig 'gro bar 'gyur ba rnams //
analyzed: gang zhig 'gro bar 'gyur ba rnams //
translated: Those who will go forth

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur //🔽zhes pas so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur // zhes pas so //
translated: will become Tathagatas.

original: de nas de nyid yi ge drug gis bsrungs la bzlas pa'i don du de nyid byin te nang par snga bar rmi lam smros shig //
analyzed: de nas de nyid yi ge drug gis bsrungs la bzlas pa'i don du de nyid byin te nang par snga bar rmi lam smros shig //
translated: Then, having protected it with the six syllables, give it to them for the purpose of recitation, and tell them, “Speak of your dreams in the early morning.”

original: ces bsgo nas yol ba'i phyi rol lam /
analyzed: ces bsgo nas yol ba'i phyi rol lam /
translated: Having instructed them, they should sleep outside the curtain

original: gnas gzhan du seng ge ltar nyal bar bya'o //
analyzed: gnas gzhan du seng ge ltar nyal bar bya'o //
translated: or in another place, lying like a lion.

original: 'di ni slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the sequence of the rite of the disciples’ special place.🔽Then, in the south of the mandala,

original: @134b de nas bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gyi lho phyogs su //
analyzed: @134b de nas bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gyi lho phyogs su //
translated: one should perform the special place with:

original: aom ho badzra ka ma la da la garbhe sha y+ee badzra su kha ma h'a ni tram ka ro mi ya th'a t'a th'a ga te /
analyzed: aom ho badzra ka ma la da la garbhe sha y+ee badzra su kha ma h'a ni tram ka ro mi ya th'a t'a th'a ga te /
translated: Oṃ ho vajra kamala dala garbhe śaye vajra sukha mahā niḥtraṃ karo mi yā tāṃ tāṃ tathāgataṃ

original: na kri t'a ha: h'a sv'a h'a /🔽zhes pas nya las lhag par gnas par bya ste /
analyzed: na kri t'a ha: h'a sv'a h'a / zhes pas nya las lhag par gnas par bya ste /
translated: na kriyā haḥ svāhā.

original: slob dpon nyal ba ni nub tu mgo bo dang shar du rkang pa'o //
analyzed: slob dpon nyal ba ni nub tu mgo bo dang shar du rkang pa'o //
translated: The master’s lying down is with the head in the west and the feet in the east.

original: gal te bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis rmi lam brtags pas /
analyzed: gal te bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis rmi lam brtags pas /
translated: If one examines one's dreams by the power of meditation,

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha mo'i tshogs kyi la gag la pi wang la sogs pa gzung ba mthong bas dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha mo'i tshogs kyi la gag la pi wang la sogs pa gzung ba mthong bas dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: one will see the assemblies of Buddhas and Bodhisattvas and of goddesses holding flutes and so on, and one will be purified.

original: yang na rdo rje rnal 'byor rnams thod pa dang gri gug phyag na gzung ba dang / khro bo'i rgyal po rnams kyis bdud dang bgegs dang log par 'dren pa la sogs pa rnams rnam par 'joms par byed pa dang / srung ba'i 'khor lo byed pa mthong na dge ba'o //
analyzed: yang na rdo rje rnal 'byor rnams thod pa dang gri gug phyag na gzung ba dang / khro bo'i rgyal po rnams kyis bdud dang bgegs dang log par 'dren pa la sogs pa rnams rnam par 'joms par byed pa dang / srung ba'i 'khor lo byed pa mthong na dge ba'o //
translated: Or else, if one sees the Vajrayoginis holding skull-cups and curved knives in their hands, and the Kings of Wrath destroying demons, obstructers, and misleaders, and creating a protection circle, that is virtuous.

original: 'on te gang yang ma mthong na 'bring po'o //
analyzed: 'on te gang yang ma mthong na 'bring po'o //
translated: If one sees nothing at all, that is middling.

original: 'on te bdud kyi tshogs rnams bkres pa dang / skom pa dang lus rid pa skams pa rnams kyi lag na thod pa dang gri gug gzung ba rnams ni skye bo dam pa rnams la bya ba ma yin pa byed par 'dod pas /
analyzed: 'on te bdud kyi tshogs rnams bkres pa dang / skom pa dang lus rid pa skams pa rnams kyi lag na thod pa dang gri gug gzung ba rnams ni skye bo dam pa rnams la bya ba ma yin pa byed par 'dod pas /
translated: If one sees the hosts of demons, hungry and thirsty, with emaciated, parched bodies, holding skull-cups and curved knives in their hands, wishing to do the impossible to holy beings,

original: slob dpon nam slob mas mthong na ngan pa'i mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: slob dpon nam slob mas mthong na ngan pa'i mtshan ma'o //
translated: If the master or the disciple sees such, it is an inauspicious sign.

original: de lta bu mthong na slob dpon nyal sa spes te /
analyzed: de lta bu mthong na slob dpon nyal sa spes te /
translated: If such is seen, the master should get up from his bed,

original: dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs kyi sa gzhi la bsdad la srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom pa dang / yang de rnams la bsrung bar 'gyur ba'i cho gas gtor ma chen po sbyin par bya ba ni /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs kyi sa gzhi la bsdad la srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom pa dang / yang de rnams la bsrung bar 'gyur ba'i cho gas gtor ma chen po sbyin par bya ba ni /
translated: and sitting on the ground in the east of the maṇḍala, he should meditate on the protection wheel and also give the great bali with the rite of protection for them.

original: de yang aom phrem badzra d'a ki n'i badzra dh'a tv'i shva ri ga ga na sva bh'a wa sarba dra by'a ni bi sho dha ni sarba dra by'a bi sho dha ya h'um phrem phat /
analyzed: de yang aom phrem badzra d'a ki n'i badzra dh'a tv'i shva ri ga ga na sva bh'a wa sarba dra by'a ni bi sho dha ni sarba dra by'a bi sho dha ya h'um phrem phat /
translated: And that is: Oṃ phaṭ vajra dakini vajra dhatviśvari gagana svabhāva sarva dravyāṇi viśodhani sarva dravyāṇi viśodhaya hūṃ phaṭ.

original: ces pa ni bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i gtor ma sbyang ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: ces pa ni bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i gtor ma sbyang ba'i sngags so //
translated: This is the mantra for purifying the bali for the pacification of obstructors.

original: de nas sangs rgyas rnams spyan drang bar bya ba ni sangs rgyas yab dang yum du bcas par gyur pa dang / sras bcas 'khor rnams lhan cig grogs dang 'brel pa rnams //
analyzed: de nas sangs rgyas rnams spyan drang bar bya ba ni sangs rgyas yab dang yum du bcas par gyur pa dang / sras bcas 'khor rnams lhan cig grogs dang 'brel pa rnams //
translated: Then, one should invite the buddhas, who are the fathers and mothers, together with their sons and retinues, and their friends.

original: lha dang lha mo'i tshogs rnams 'dus pas bskor ba yis /
analyzed: lha dang lha mo'i tshogs rnams 'dus pas bskor ba yis /
translated: Surrounded by the assembly of gods and goddesses,

original: dgyes gyur rdo rje sems dpa' mchog nyid gshegs su gsol //
analyzed: dgyes gyur rdo rje sems dpa' mchog nyid gshegs su gsol //
translated: rejoicing, come, O Vajrasattva, supreme one!

original: zhes pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams rang rang gi khams la gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams rang rang gi khams la gzhug par bya'o //
translated: With this [verse] the Tathagatas and so forth are caused to enter their respective realms.

original: de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams spyan drang ba'i sngags 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams spyan drang ba'i sngags 'di lta ste /
translated: Then, with the vajra-empowerment, the mantra for invoking the Vajraḍākinīs is as follows:

original: aom ha h'a hi h'i badzra bhee ra ba a'a krsha ya a'a ka rsha ya /
analyzed: aom ha h'a hi h'i badzra bhee ra ba a'a krsha ya a'a ka rsha ya /
translated: Oṃ, ha ha, hi hi, O Vajra Heruka, draw forth, draw forth!

original: pra we sha ya pra we sha ya /🔽bandha ya bndha ya /
analyzed: pra we sha ya pra we sha ya / bandha ya bndha ya /
translated: Enter, enter!🔽Bind, bind!

original: to sha ya to sha ya /
analyzed: to sha ya to sha ya /
translated: Delight, delight!

original: dza: h'um bam ho:/
analyzed: dza: h'um bam ho:/
translated: Jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ!

original: badzra d'a ki n'i n'am @135a * //
analyzed: badzra d'a ki n'i n'am @135a * //
translated: Vajraḍākinīs!

original: hri da yam h'um h'um phrem phrem phat /
analyzed: hri da yam h'um h'um phrem phrem phat /
translated: Stir the hearts, hūṃ hūṃ, pheṭ pheṭ!

original: ces pas so //
analyzed: ces pas so //
translated: With this [verse].

original: de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgyas rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams la gtor ma dri dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / mar me dang / mchod yon dang / 'bras bu ma nyams pa rnams dang bcas pa gsung bar 'gyur ba'i cho gas sbyin par byas pas phyi rol gyi dur khrod kyis gzhi la bza' ba dang btung ba byed par bsam mo //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgyas rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams la gtor ma dri dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / mar me dang / mchod yon dang / 'bras bu ma nyams pa rnams dang bcas pa gsung bar 'gyur ba'i cho gas sbyin par byas pas phyi rol gyi dur khrod kyis gzhi la bza' ba dang btung ba byed par bsam mo //
translated: Then, with the vajra-fist, one should offer the sacrificial cake to the vajra-dakinis with scent, flowers, incense, lamps, water for the feet, and undamaged fruit, with the rite of the mantra of the pledge.

original: de nas bdud dang bgegs la sogs pa bzhi bar bya ba'i don du rkang ba bcu drug pa dang phreng ba'i sngags bzlas pa ste /
analyzed: de nas bdud dang bgegs la sogs pa bzhi bar bya ba'i don du rkang ba bcu drug pa dang phreng ba'i sngags bzlas pa ste /
translated: Then, for the purpose of warding off the four, namely, Mara, obstacles, and so forth, one should recite the sixteen-line and garland mantras.

original: cho ga 'di thig 'debs ba'i skabs su yang go bar bya'o //
analyzed: cho ga 'di thig 'debs ba'i skabs su yang go bar bya'o //
translated: This rite should be understood also in the context of the drawing of the lines.

original: 'di ni bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i cho ga'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i cho ga'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the procedure for the rite of warding off obstacles.

original: de nas nang par snga bar rdo rje slob dpon gyis gtor ma gtang ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa nas 'thon la slob ma rnams la rmi lam dri bar bya ste /
analyzed: de nas nang par snga bar rdo rje slob dpon gyis gtor ma gtang ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa nas 'thon la slob ma rnams la rmi lam dri bar bya ste /
translated: Then, early in the morning, the vajra-master should offer the sacrificial cake, and having left the mandala house, he should ask the disciples about their dreams.

original: mi dge na phreng ba'i sngags kyis yang dag par bsrung ngo //
analyzed: mi dge na phreng ba'i sngags kyis yang dag par bsrung ngo //
translated: If it is inauspicious, one should protect it with the mantra of the rosary.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi khang par 'jug pa'i dus su bdud la sogs pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i don du sgrub thabs su gsungs pa'i cho gas srung ba'i 'khor lo sngon du song bas /
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi khang par 'jug pa'i dus su bdud la sogs pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i don du sgrub thabs su gsungs pa'i cho gas srung ba'i 'khor lo sngon du song bas /
translated: Then, at the time of entering the maṇḍala house, in order to pacify the māras and so on, having performed the protection wheel as taught in the sādhana,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi rnal 'byor la dmigs pa dang / yan lag drug dgod pa dang / phyag rgya drug dang phyag rgya bzhi dgod par byas la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi rnal 'byor la dmigs pa dang / yan lag drug dgod pa dang / phyag rgya drug dang phyag rgya bzhi dgod par byas la /
translated: one should visualize the yoga of the Bhagavān, arrange the six branches, and arrange the six mudras and four mudras.🔽Then the disciples

original: de nas slob ma rnams kyis /
analyzed: de nas slob ma rnams kyis /
translated: recite:

original: aom pra we sha bha ga w'a a ma h'a su kha mo ksha su ram sarba siddhi su kha pra dam par ma su kha autta ma siddhya dza: h'um bam ho:/
analyzed: aom pra we sha bha ga w'a a ma h'a su kha mo ksha su ram sarba siddhi su kha pra dam par ma su kha autta ma siddhya dza: h'um bam ho:/
translated: oṃ praveśa bhagavāma mahāsukha mokṣa suraṃ sarvasiddhi sukha pradāṃ parama sukhottama siddhyājaya hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ

original: pra siddhya sv'a /

original: sems can kun gyi yab gyur pa //

original: bden pa'i ye shes mchog gyur pa //

analyzed: shes rab thabs bdag dkyil 'khor gyi // bden pas bdag la mgon po kye //

analyzed: 'dod pa yongs su gnang bar mdzod / ces pas so //
translated: O protector, please grant me the desired [empowerment].

analyzed: 'di ni slob dpon bdag 'jug gi cho ga'i rim pa'o //

analyzed: de nas slob ma lhag par gnas pa byas pa rnams khrus byas te /

analyzed: dri zhim po la sogs pas dag par byas nas brtul zhugs blang bar bya ba ni /
translated: and after being purified with perfume, and so on, they should take the vows.

analyzed: gsod dang mi bden pa dang gzhan gyi bud med rnams spang de bzhin gzhan nor chang 'thung dag kyang ste //

analyzed: 'khor bar rdo rje'i zhags pa rang gi dge ba 'joms par byed pa sdig pa lnga po 'di nyid rnams //

analyzed: gang zhig gang gi dus su byung ba'i lha dang mi yi bla ma de yi ming gis rab tu sbyin byas pa'i //
translated: “ Whatever name of the deity or human guru that arises at the time,

analyzed: sna tshogs gtso bo'i bka' stsal 'di yis srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pas khyed @136b rnams kyis kyang bskyang bar gyis // rgyan 'gyed kha na ma tho bcas pa'i zas dang tshig ngan klog dang 'byung po lha min chos rnams dang // ba lang byis pa bud med skyes pa rnams dang lha dang mi rnams bla ma lnga ni gsad mi bya //
translated: Since this statement of the chief of the various [Buddhas] conquers the fear of existence, you should also protect it.🔽The five [types of] persons not to be killed are those who give food with pretense, those who read bad words, those who are spirits, those who are asuras, and those who are religious.🔽The five [types of] persons not to be killed are those who are friends, those who are masters, those who are gods, those who are humans, and those who are gurus.

original: grogs dang rje bo dang ni lha dang mi yi bla ma dge 'dun dbyugs 'byin rnams la 'khu ba dang // dbang po rnams kyis yongs su chags rnams min te srid pa'i bdag po'i brtul zhugs nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
analyzed: grogs dang rje bo dang ni lha dang mi yi bla ma dge 'dun dbyugs 'byin rnams la 'khu ba dang // dbang po rnams kyis yongs su chags rnams min te srid pa'i bdag po'i brtul zhugs nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
translated: The twenty-five observances of the lord of existence are not to be angry with one’s friends, masters, gods, humans, gurus, and saṅgha; and not to be attached to the sense organs.

original: zhes so // de nas yol ba'i phyi rol du slob ma rnams dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor dmigs la /
analyzed: zhes so // de nas yol ba'i phyi rol du slob ma rnams dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor dmigs la /
translated: Then, outside the curtain, the disciples are visualized as the principal deity of the maṇḍala.

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nuttara bo dhi aa lam ka ra bsta p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spa ra na sa ma ye h'um /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nuttara bo dhi aa lam ka ra bsta p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spa ra na sa ma ye h'um /

analyzed: zhes pas smad g-yogs bcing ngo //

analyzed: aom dv'a da sha am gi ka ni ro dha ri ne h'um phat /

analyzed: ces pas mig ras bcing ngo //

original: a'a kham b'i ra h'um /
analyzed: a'a kham b'i ra h'um /

original: zhes pas me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du gzhug go //
analyzed: zhes pas me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du gzhug go //
translated: With that, one should cause them to hold the flower garland.

original: de nas slob mas dkyil 'khor du 'jug yon phul ba dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i dung gi chus gtor te /
analyzed: de nas slob mas dkyil 'khor du 'jug yon phul ba dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i dung gi chus gtor te /
translated: Then the disciple enters the maṇḍala, offers a gift, and sprinkles the water of the victorious conch.

original: snying ga dang mgrin pa dang dpral ba rnams su gdan gyi steng du yi ge gsum gyi 'od zer gyis lus dri ma med par byas te /
analyzed: snying ga dang mgrin pa dang dpral ba rnams su gdan gyi steng du yi ge gsum gyi 'od zer gyis lus dri ma med par byas te /
translated: At the heart, throat, and forehead, on seats, one should purify the body with the light rays of the three syllables.

original: h'um zhes brjod nas dkyil 'khor gyi shar gyi sgo ru gnas pa las kyi rdo rjes gzung ba dang / dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dri bar bya ba ni /
analyzed: h'um zhes brjod nas dkyil 'khor gyi shar gyi sgo ru gnas pa las kyi rdo rjes gzung ba dang / dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dri bar bya ba ni /
translated: Saying hūṃ, he remains at the eastern door of the maṇḍala, holding the action vajra, and asks about entering the maṇḍala.

original: kye ho bu sdug khyod su yin zhes pa'i lan /
analyzed: kye ho bu sdug khyod su yin zhes pa'i lan /
translated: “O son, what is your name?”

original: bde chen skal ldan bdag lags so zhes pa brjod na /
analyzed: bde chen skal ldan bdag lags so zhes pa brjod na /
translated: “I am the fortunate one of great bliss.”

original: de nyid brjod du gzhug go //
analyzed: de nyid brjod du gzhug go //
translated: Having said that, he should be made to repeat it.

original: aom sarba yo gtsitta auta p'a da y'a mi /
analyzed: aom sarba yo gtsitta auta p'a da y'a mi /
translated: “oṃ sarva yogicitta utpādayā mi”

original: zhes pas byang chub kyi sems bskyed la me tog dang bcas pa'i rdo rje snying gar bzhag la /
analyzed: zhes pas byang chub kyi sems bskyed la me tog dang bcas pa'i rdo rje snying gar bzhag la /
translated: Having generated the mind of awakening, place the vajra with flowers at the heart and say:

original: aom su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho singnghi badzra ya th'a su kham ;
analyzed: aom su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho singnghi badzra ya th'a su kham ;
translated: “oṃ surate samayastvaṃ hoḥ / siṃgha vajra yathā sukhaṃ”

original: zhes pa brjod cing rdo rje la 'dzin du gzhug go //
analyzed: zhes pa brjod cing rdo rje la 'dzin du gzhug go //
translated: Having said that, he should be made to hold the vajra.

original: de nas brjod pa /
analyzed: de nas brjod pa /
translated: Then say:

original: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob pas khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di dkyil 'khor mi mthong pa rnams la smra bar ma byed cig ces brjod la /
analyzed: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob pas khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di dkyil 'khor mi mthong pa rnams la smra bar ma byed cig ces brjod la /
translated: Today, you are blessed by all the tathagatas. You must not speak of this great, supreme secret mandala of all the tathagatas to those who have not seen the mandala.

original: aom bigha n'anta kri ta h'um /
analyzed: aom bigha n'anta kri ta h'um /
translated: Om vighatanakrita hum.

original: zhes pas dgug par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pas dgug par bya'o //
translated: With this, summon them.

original: de nas yang /
analyzed: de nas yang /
translated: Then,

original: a'a kham b'i ra h'um /
analyzed: a'a kham b'i ra h'um /
translated: Om akhaṃvīra hum.

original: zhes pas yol ba'i nang du bcug ste /
analyzed: zhes pas yol ba'i nang du bcug ste /
translated: With this, have them enter inside the curtain.

original: aom ma h'a ra ta su to shya su su kho badzra sa tva a'arya siddhya mam /
analyzed: aom ma h'a ra ta su to shya su su kho badzra sa tva a'arya siddhya mam /
translated: Om mahārata sutoshya sukho bhava vajrasattva āryasiddhyamam.

original: zhes brjod cing bskor ba bya'o //
analyzed: zhes brjod cing bskor ba bya'o //
translated: With this, have them circumambulate.

original: de nas thal mo sbyar la shar sgo nas brjod pa /🔽aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dz'a au pasth'a na ya a'atma nam @137a * //
analyzed: de nas thal mo sbyar la shar sgo nas brjod pa / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dz'a au pasth'a na ya a'atma nam @137a * //
translated: Then, with palms joined, say from the eastern door:

original: n'i ry'a ta y'a mi sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra stva aa dhi tishtha m'am /
analyzed: n'i ry'a ta y'a mi sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra stva aa dhi tishtha m'am /
translated: Om sarvatathāgatapūjāupasthānaṃ niryātayāmi sarvatathāgatavajrasatvadhiṣṭite.

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dz'a karma ne a'atma nam ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dz'a karma ne a'atma nam ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
translated: Oṃ, all tathāgatas, I am the one who has been generated as the nature of the karma of all offerings.

original: sarba tth'a ga ta badzra karma ku ru mam zhes pas so //
analyzed: sarba tth'a ga ta badzra karma ku ru mam zhes pas so //
translated: All tathāgatas, please grant me the vajra karma.

original: de nas lho phyogs nas aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza aa bhi she ka ya a'atma nam niry'a ta y'a mi /
analyzed: de nas lho phyogs nas aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza aa bhi she ka ya a'atma nam niry'a ta y'a mi /
translated: Then from the south, Oṃ, all tathāgatas, I am the one who has been generated as the nature of the empowerment of all offerings.

original: sarba ta th'a gta badzra rtn'a bhi shinytsa mam zhes pas so //
analyzed: sarba ta th'a gta badzra rtn'a bhi shinytsa mam zhes pas so //
translated: All tathāgatas, please empower me with the vajra jewel.

original: de nas nub phyogs nas aom sarba buddha p'u dza au pa sth'a n'a ya a'atma nam niry'a ta ya mam sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra bee ro tsa na aa dhi tishtha mam zhes pas so //
analyzed: de nas nub phyogs nas aom sarba buddha p'u dza au pa sth'a n'a ya a'atma nam niry'a ta ya mam sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra bee ro tsa na aa dhi tishtha mam zhes pas so //
translated: Then from the west, Oṃ, all buddhas, I am the one who has been generated as the nature of the near-empowerment of all offerings.🔽All tathāgatas, please firmly establish me in the vajra lotus.🔽Then from the north, Oṃ, all tathāgatas, I am the one who has been generated as the nature of the proclamation of all offerings.

original: de nas byang phyogs nas aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza pra wa rta n'a ya a'atma nam ni ry'a ta y'a mi sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra dharmma pra wa rta yamam zhes pas so //
analyzed: de nas byang phyogs nas aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza pra wa rta n'a ya a'atma nam ni ry'a ta y'a mi sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra dharmma pra wa rta yamam zhes pas so //
translated: All tathāgatas, please proclaim me with the vajra dharma.

original: de nas yang shar phyogs su 'ongs nas aom gu ru tsa ra na au pa sth'a n'a ya a'atma nan ni ry'a ta y'ami aom sarba sa tva pa ri tr'a n'a ya /🔽a'atma nam ni ry'a ta y'a m'i /🔽zhes pa'i don go bar byas la klag tu gzhug go //🔽de nas yang /
analyzed: de nas yang shar phyogs su 'ongs nas aom gu ru tsa ra na au pa sth'a n'a ya a'atma nan ni ry'a ta y'ami aom sarba sa tva pa ri tr'a n'a ya / a'atma nam ni ry'a ta y'a m'i / zhes pa'i don go bar byas la klag tu gzhug go // de nas yang /
translated: Then, having come from the east, one should be made to recite the meaning of this:

original: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs pas de'i phyir rdo rje ye shes skyed do //
analyzed: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs pas de'i phyir rdo rje ye shes skyed do //
translated: Oṃ, you have entered into the lineage of all tathāgatas, therefore I will generate the vajra pristine consciousness.

original: ye shes des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub rnams kyang thob na dngos grub gzhan lta ci smos ;
analyzed: ye shes des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub rnams kyang thob na dngos grub gzhan lta ci smos ;
translated: By that pristine consciousness, you will attain the powers of all tathāgatas, not to mention other powers.

original: gal te khyod kyi dam tshig 'das na sdug bsngal chen po ster bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir khyod kyis 'di dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi sngon du smra bar mi bya'o zhes brjod de /
analyzed: gal te khyod kyi dam tshig 'das na sdug bsngal chen po ster bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir khyod kyis 'di dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi sngon du smra bar mi bya'o zhes brjod de /
translated: If you transgress your sacred pledge, you will be given great suffering. Therefore you should not speak of this in front of those who have not seen the maṇḍala.”

original: mgo la rdo rje bzhag la dril bu dkrol zhing brjod pa /
analyzed: mgo la rdo rje bzhag la dril bu dkrol zhing brjod pa /
translated: Place the vajra on their head, ring the bell, and say:

original: 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ste //
analyzed: 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ste //
translated: This is the pledge vajra.

original: gal te smras na mgo bo 'gems //
analyzed: gal te smras na mgo bo 'gems //
translated: If you speak of it, your head will split.

original: zhes pa go bar byas la /
analyzed: zhes pa go bar byas la /
translated: Having understood this,

original: snying gar rdo rje gzung ste /
analyzed: snying gar rdo rje gzung ste /
translated: hold the vajra to your heart.

original: aom dus kyi 'khor lo khyod nyid kyi //
analyzed: aom dus kyi 'khor lo khyod nyid kyi //
translated: Oṃ. You are the wheel of time.

original: snying la yang dag gnas pa ste //
analyzed: snying la yang dag gnas pa ste //
translated: You should abide in my heart.

original: gal te gzhan la smras pa na //
analyzed: gal te gzhan la smras pa na //
translated: If you speak of this to others,

original: de ma thag tu dran te gshegs //🔽zhes pa'i bka' stsal byin la rnam rgyal gyi dung mthe bong dang srin lag gis blangs te /
analyzed: de ma thag tu dran te gshegs // zhes pa'i bka' stsal byin la rnam rgyal gyi dung mthe bong dang srin lag gis blangs te /
translated: I will immediately come and crush you.

original: de yi khar sbyin par bya zhing //
analyzed: de yi khar sbyin par bya zhing //
translated: Having given this command, take the victory conch with your thumb and ring finger and place it in their mouth.

original: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
analyzed: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
translated: This is your hell water.

original: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
analyzed: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
translated: If you transgress your pledge, it will burn you.

original: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub thob //
analyzed: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub thob //
translated: If you keep your pledge, you will attain spiritual powers.

original: 'thung cig rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu //
analyzed: 'thung cig rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu //
translated: Drink this vajra amṛta water.

original: zhes brjod cing mna' chu blud do //
analyzed: zhes brjod cing mna' chu blud do //
translated: Say this and give the pledge water to drink.

original: deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi dus kyi 'khor lo nga yin pas gang bsgo ba khyod kyis bya dgos so //
analyzed: deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi dus kyi 'khor lo nga yin pas gang bsgo ba khyod kyis bya dgos so //
translated: From now on, since I am your Wheel of Time, you must do whatever I command.

original: de phyir bag dang ldan par gyis shig / mi mthun pas rkyen byas nas dmyal bar lhung bar ma byed cig ces brjod do //
analyzed: de phyir bag dang ldan par gyis shig / mi mthun pas rkyen byas nas dmyal bar lhung bar ma byed cig ces brjod do //
translated: Therefore, be careful! Do not fall into hell due to adverse conditions.

original: 'di ni dam tshig gi chu'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dam tshig gi chu'i cho ga'o //
translated: This is the procedure of the pledge water.

original: de nas dngos grub nges pa'i don du bsgrub pa sngon du byas la mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob ma la lha dbab par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas dngos grub nges pa'i don du bsgrub pa sngon du byas la mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob ma la lha dbab par bya'o //
translated: Then, for the sake of ascertaining the powers, having performed the prior service, one should cause the deity to descend into the disciple who has the characteristics.

original: de yang 'du 'dzi med pa'i gnas su dus kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor @137b la gnas la bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg gis mnyes par bya ste /
analyzed: de yang 'du 'dzi med pa'i gnas su dus kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor @137b la gnas la bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg gis mnyes par bya ste /
translated: Moreover, in a place free from distraction, abiding in the yoga of Kālacakra, one should please the deity with recitation and burnt offerings.

original: dbab pa'i nus pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: dbab pa'i nus pa dang ldan pas /
translated: Endowed with the power of descent,

original: slob ma mdun du bzhag la skad cig gis stong par btang ba'i rjes la aa yig las 'od dpag tu med par bskyed de /
analyzed: slob ma mdun du bzhag la skad cig gis stong par btang ba'i rjes la aa yig las 'od dpag tu med par bskyed de /
translated: placing the disciple in front, having instantly emptied, after that, one should generate Amitābha from the letter A.

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta shtsa aa dhi tishtha na tam k'a la tsa gro me a'a we sha tu /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta shtsa aa dhi tishtha na tam k'a la tsa gro me a'a we sha tu /
translated: oṃ sarvatathāgata śrī adhiṣṭhāna taṃ kāla cakra āveśaya

original: zhes brjod pa dang / de'i lte bar lam las byung ba'i sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa ser po 'khor los mtshan pa dus me'i steng du ho ser po'o //
analyzed: zhes brjod pa dang / de'i lte bar lam las byung ba'i sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa ser po 'khor los mtshan pa dus me'i steng du ho ser po'o //
translated: Having said that, in its center, from a path, is a square yellow earth mandala, marked with a wheel, upon a Rāhu, a yellow ho.

original: snying gar yam las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor g-yo ba'i ba dan gnyis kyis mtshan pa nag po gzhu'i rnam pa sgra gcan gyi steng du h'um nag po'o //
analyzed: snying gar yam las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor g-yo ba'i ba dan gnyis kyis mtshan pa nag po gzhu'i rnam pa sgra gcan gyi steng du h'um nag po'o //
translated: In the heart, from yaṃ arises a black wind mandala in the shape of a bow, marked with two moving banners, upon Rāhu, a black hūṃ.

original: mgrin par ram yig las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum dmar po rin po ches mtshan pa nyi ma'i steng du a'a: dmar po'o //
analyzed: mgrin par ram yig las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum dmar po rin po ches mtshan pa nyi ma'i steng du a'a: dmar po'o //
translated: In the throat, from raṃ arises a triangular red fire mandala, marked with a jewel, upon the sun, a red āḥ.

original: dpral bar wam yig las byung ba'i chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po dkar ba bum pas mtshan pa zla ba'i steng du aom dkar po rnam par bsgoms te /
analyzed: dpral bar wam yig las byung ba'i chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po dkar ba bum pas mtshan pa zla ba'i steng du aom dkar po rnam par bsgoms te /
