translated: Then, having obtained all the empowerments, and having understood all the meanings of the tantras that arise from hearing, contemplating, and meditating, you should follow the path of all the sugatas, the glorious guru, and having abandoned the buddhas, bodhisattvas, and gurus other than you,🔽

original: gzhan la gus par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan la gus par mi bya'o //
translated: Then, having obtained all the initiations, and having understood all the meanings of the tantras that arise from hearing, contemplating, and meditating, I will follow you, glorious guru, the path of all the sugatas, and will not pay homage to any other guru, abandoning the buddhas, bodhisattvas, and you.

original: de ltar dam bcas nas /🔽de nas bla ma la gsol ba gdab pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar dam bcas nas / de nas bla ma la gsol ba gdab pa ni /
translated: Having made such a promise,

original: sngon gyi tshigs su bcad pas so //
analyzed: sngon gyi tshigs su bcad pas so //
translated: then supplicate the guru with the previous verse.

original: de nas lhag pa'i bdag po'i don du cho ga 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de nas lhag pa'i bdag po'i don du cho ga 'di lta ste /
translated: Then, for the sake of the special master, this is the rite:

original: dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa'i phyi rol du sa gzhi mnyam pa'i cha la khru bzhi'i bar la ba lang gi lci ba la sogs pas byugs pa tshon lnga'i rab byas te /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa'i phyi rol du sa gzhi mnyam pa'i cha la khru bzhi'i bar la ba lang gi lci ba la sogs pas byugs pa tshon lnga'i rab byas te /
translated: Outside the maṇḍala house, on a level area, up to four cubits, smear cow dung, and so on, and make five-colored lines.

original: de'i dbus su khru do pa'i gdan gyi steng du padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris la de'i steng du slob dpon dge slong bzhag la gzugs bzang ba rgyan dang ldan pa bu ma skyes pa'i bu mo brgyad /
analyzed: de'i dbus su khru do pa'i gdan gyi steng du padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris la de'i steng du slob dpon dge slong bzhag la gzugs bzang ba rgyan dang ldan pa bu ma skyes pa'i bu mo brgyad /
translated: In the middle of that, on a seat two cubits in size, draw an eight-petaled lotus. On top of that, place the master, a fully ordained monk, who is well proportioned and adorned with ornaments. Eight unmarried girls and two young women, together with the vases of victory and complete victory, should tie the crown, the ribbon, and the seal.

original: gzhon nu ma gnyis rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dang bcas pas cod pan dang dar dbyangs dang / phyag rgya dang bcas pas bcings la khrus bya'o //
analyzed: gzhon nu ma gnyis rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dang bcas pas cod pan dang dar dbyangs dang / phyag rgya dang bcas pas bcings la khrus bya'o //
translated: The master should be bathed.

original: dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sdigs mdzub dang chos gos mthong bas gdug pa de rnams 'og tu 'gro ba'o zhes so //
analyzed: dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sdigs mdzub dang chos gos mthong bas gdug pa de rnams 'og tu 'gro ba'o zhes so //
translated: By seeing the threatening gesture and the Dharma robe of the fully ordained vajra holder, those evildoers will go below.

original: de ltar re kh'a lnga dang ldan pa'i dbus su padma dang bral ba'i gdan la slob dpon dge tshul bzhag pa la phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i dar dbyangs byin la /
analyzed: de ltar re kh'a lnga dang ldan pa'i dbus su padma dang bral ba'i gdan la slob dpon dge tshul bzhag pa la phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i dar dbyangs byin la /
translated: In the middle of that, on a seat devoid of a lotus, place the master, a novice monk, and give him the ribbon together with the seal.

original: bu mo bzhi dang gzhon nu ma gnyis kyis khrus bya'o //
analyzed: bu mo bzhi dang gzhon nu ma gnyis kyis khrus bya'o //
translated: Four girls and two young women should bathe him.

original: de ltar re kh'a gsum dang ldan pa'i dbus su tha mal gyi gdan la slob dpon khyim pa bzhag la phyag rgya byin te /
analyzed: de ltar re kh'a gsum dang ldan pa'i dbus su tha mal gyi gdan la slob dpon khyim pa bzhag la phyag rgya byin te /
translated: Thus, in the center possessing three lines, the master, a householder, is placed on an ordinary seat, and the consort is given.

original: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa gcig pus gzhon nu ma gcig gis khrus bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa gcig pus gzhon nu ma gcig gis khrus bya'o //
translated: With a single victorious vase, a single maiden should be bathed.

original: 'di ni mchog dang bar ma dang tha ma'i slob dpon gyi dbang gi cho ga'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mchog dang bar ma dang tha ma'i slob dpon gyi dbang gi cho ga'o //
translated: This is the rite of the initiation of the master, supreme, middling, and inferior.

original: de nas dbang gong ma'i don du slob mas slob dpon la phyag rgya bcu gtad de /
analyzed: de nas dbang gong ma'i don du slob mas slob dpon la phyag rgya bcu gtad de /
translated: Then, for the sake of the higher initiation, the disciple offers the ten mudras to the master.

original: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa /
analyzed: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa /
translated: Moreover, it is stated in the Root Tantra:🔽Niece, daughter, sister, and mother,

original: tsha mo dang ni bu mo dang // sring mo skyed byed ma de bzhin //
analyzed: tsha mo dang ni bu mo dang // sring mo skyed byed ma de bzhin //
translated: and likewise,

original: chung ma'i ma ste sgyug mo nyid //
analyzed: chung ma'i ma ste sgyug mo nyid //
translated: the mother of one’s wife, the mother-in-law,

original: de bzhin du ni zhang ne mo //
analyzed: de bzhin du ni zhang ne mo //
translated: and likewise, the paternal aunt,

original: pha yi de bzhin spun chung ma //
analyzed: pha yi de bzhin spun chung ma //
translated: the sister of one’s father,🔽the sister of one’s mother,

original: skyed byed kyi ni sring mo dang // rang gi ma yi sbun nyid dang // rang gi chung ma mchog gzugs can //
analyzed: skyed byed kyi ni sring mo dang // rang gi ma yi sbun nyid dang // rang gi chung ma mchog gzugs can //
translated: and one’s own wife of supreme form.

original: sgrol ma la sogs chos khams mthar //
analyzed: sgrol ma la sogs chos khams mthar //
translated: Tārā and so on, up to the element of phenomena.

original: rig ma bcu rnams rang rigs skyes //
analyzed: rig ma bcu rnams rang rigs skyes //
translated: The ten knowledge consorts are born from their own families.

original: thar pa 'dod pa'i khyim pa yis //
analyzed: thar pa 'dod pa'i khyim pa yis //
translated: The householder who desires liberation

original: dbang gi dus su rab sbyin bya //
analyzed: dbang gi dus su rab sbyin bya //
translated: should give them at the time of empowerment.

original: gang zhig rigs ni 'di bsrungs pas //
analyzed: gang zhig rigs ni 'di bsrungs pas //
translated: If one who has guarded this family

original: bla mar rig ma mi dbul na //
analyzed: bla mar rig ma mi dbul na //
translated: does not offer the knowledge consort to the guru,

original: de la dbang ni sbyin mi bya //
analyzed: de la dbang ni sbyin mi bya //
translated: the empowerment should not be given to him.

original: gzhan du na ni khyim nas min //🔽dkyil 'khor rnams su dbang bskur ba'i //
analyzed: gzhan du na ni khyim nas min // dkyil 'khor rnams su dbang bskur ba'i //
translated: Otherwise, not from the house.🔽Also, the assembly born from the śūdra caste

original: gzhan yang dmangs rigs skyes tshogs rnams //🔽dge slong @144a * //🔽dge tshul rnams la yang //🔽bla mas sbyin no mi bdag kye //
analyzed: gzhan yang dmangs rigs skyes tshogs rnams // dge slong @144a * // dge tshul rnams la yang // bla mas sbyin no mi bdag kye //
translated: and the assembly born from the kṣatriya caste🔽and the assembly born from the brahmin caste

original: rlung sogs rim pas dmangs rigs dang // rgyal rigs bram ze de bzhin du //🔽rje'u rigs g-yung mo nya ma dang // gar mtshos ma de bzhin du //
analyzed: rlung sogs rim pas dmangs rigs dang // rgyal rigs bram ze de bzhin du // rje'u rigs g-yung mo nya ma dang // gar mtshos ma de bzhin du //
translated: and the assembly born from the vaiśya caste🔽and the assembly born from the candāla caste🔽and the assembly born from the pukkasa caste🔽and the assembly born from the dombī caste🔽and the assembly born from the rajayavaka caste🔽and the assembly born from the dhigvaṇaka caste

original: ko lpags mkhan dang gtum mo dang // chos khams mthar de bcu po rnams ;
analyzed: ko lpags mkhan dang gtum mo dang // chos khams mthar de bcu po rnams ;
translated: and the assembly born from the caṇḍāla caste

original: / rig ma chen mor yang dag bshad //
analyzed: / rig ma chen mor yang dag bshad //
translated: are explained as the ten great knowledge consorts.

original: zos dang grol 'bras rab tu ster //
analyzed: zos dang grol 'bras rab tu ster //
translated: They grant the results of eating and liberation.

original: zhes pas 'di thams cad sngon du song ba ltar dmangs rigs la sogs pa phyag rgya bcus dge slong la'o //
analyzed: zhes pas 'di thams cad sngon du song ba ltar dmangs rigs la sogs pa phyag rgya bcus dge slong la'o //
translated: As stated above, the ten mudras, such as the shudra, are for the fully ordained monk.

original: de rnams kyi nang nas drug gis dge tshul gyi'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi nang nas drug gis dge tshul gyi'o //
translated: Among those, six are for the novice monk.

original: rang gi chung ma gcig pus khyim pa la'o //
analyzed: rang gi chung ma gcig pus khyim pa la'o //
translated: One’s own wife alone is for the layperson.

original: 'di ni shes rab kyi ye shes kyi chos kyi dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni shes rab kyi ye shes kyi chos kyi dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: This is the empowerment of the wisdom of wisdom.

original: lhag ma rnams ni snga ma ltar ro //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni snga ma ltar ro //
translated: The rest are as before.

original: chu la sogs pa'i dbang bdun gyis sa bdun du lung bstan pa dge bsnyen no //
analyzed: chu la sogs pa'i dbang bdun gyis sa bdun du lung bstan pa dge bsnyen no //
translated: The seven empowerments of water and so on are for the upasaka of the seven bhumis.

original: bum pas brgyad pa mi g-yo bar lung bstan pa dge tshul gzhon nu'i zhes pas so //
analyzed: bum pas brgyad pa mi g-yo bar lung bstan pa dge tshul gzhon nu'i zhes pas so //
translated: The vase empowerment is for the young novice monk of the eighth bhumi, Acala.

original: gsang bas legs pa'i blo gros su lung bstan pa dge slong sangs rgyas kyi sras rgyal tshab bo //
analyzed: gsang bas legs pa'i blo gros su lung bstan pa dge slong sangs rgyas kyi sras rgyal tshab bo //
translated: The secret empowerment is for the fully ordained monk, the son of the Buddha, the regent of the ninth bhumi, Sutejas.

original: shes rab ye shes kyis chos kyi sprin du lung bstan pa gnas brtan te sangs rgyas gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab ye shes kyis chos kyi sprin du lung bstan pa gnas brtan te sangs rgyas gnyis pa'o //
translated: The wisdom-knowledge empowerment is for the elder of the tenth bhumi, Dharmasagara, the second buddha.

original: de nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer bya ba'i don du gser las byas pa'i mchod phyir thogs dang / phyag rgya dang / dar dbyangs dang / cod pan rnams ni bum pa dang / gsang ba dang / shes rab ye shes te gong ma'i gong ma'i dbang gi cho ga'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer bya ba'i don du gser las byas pa'i mchod phyir thogs dang / phyag rgya dang / dar dbyangs dang / cod pan rnams ni bum pa dang / gsang ba dang / shes rab ye shes te gong ma'i gong ma'i dbang gi cho ga'i rim pa'o //
translated: lamp, perfume, food, music, and so forth. The meaning of the consecration is that the disciple is consecrated as a master of the mandala.

original: de nas shar gyi sgo ru slob ma'i steng du gdugs bzung la g-yas su bskor ba byed bzhin pas //
analyzed: de nas shar gyi sgo ru slob ma'i steng du gdugs bzung la g-yas su bskor ba byed bzhin pas //
translated: Then, at the eastern door, holding the parasol above the disciple, while circumambulating to the right,

original: thal mo sbyar byas dkyil 'khor bskor //
analyzed: thal mo sbyar byas dkyil 'khor bskor //
translated: with palms joined, one should circumambulate the mandala.

original: gdugs dang bcas pas mchod pa la //
analyzed: gdugs dang bcas pas mchod pa la //
translated: With the parasol, make offerings

original: slob ma 'di ni khyod la gtad //
analyzed: slob ma 'di ni khyod la gtad //
translated: and entrust this disciple to you.

original: rgyud kyi 'dzin pa po ru mdzod ;
analyzed: rgyud kyi 'dzin pa po ru mdzod ;
translated: Make him a holder of the tantra.

original: / ces dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo la de ltar gsol ba btab pa dang / gdugs gzhan du bzhag la slob ma'i yid la 'dod pa sbyin par bya ste /
analyzed: / ces dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo la de ltar gsol ba btab pa dang / gdugs gzhan du bzhag la slob ma'i yid la 'dod pa sbyin par bya ste /
translated: Having thus offered a supplication to the principal of the mandala, place the parasol elsewhere and grant whatever the disciple desires.

original: da ni dkyil 'khor slob dpon 'gyur //
analyzed: da ni dkyil 'khor slob dpon 'gyur //
translated: Now you have become a master of the mandala.

original: sngags dang rgyud kyi 'dzin pa khyod //
analyzed: sngags dang rgyud kyi 'dzin pa khyod //
translated: You are a holder of mantra and tantra.

original: sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems //
translated: The buddhas, the bodhisattvas,

original: lha rnams kun kyang mnyes par 'gyur //
analyzed: lha rnams kun kyang mnyes par 'gyur //
translated: and all the gods will be pleased.

original: sems can kun la brtse ba yis //🔽chog bzhin dkyil 'khor khyod nyid kyis //
analyzed: sems can kun la brtse ba yis // chog bzhin dkyil 'khor khyod nyid kyis //
translated: Out of love for all sentient beings,🔽you should draw the maṇḍala

original: shin tu rtsol bas bri bar bya //
analyzed: shin tu rtsol bas bri bar bya //
translated: with great effort, just as it is prescribed.

original: sgrub pa po yi rgyud la zhugs //
analyzed: sgrub pa po yi rgyud la zhugs //
translated: It will enter the continuum of the practitioner.

original: gsang chen mchog gi dkyil 'khor du //
analyzed: gsang chen mchog gi dkyil 'khor du //
translated: In the maṇḍala of the supreme secret,

original: mchog tu lta zhing zhugs pa yis //🔽de ring khyod kyi sdig pa rnams //
analyzed: mchog tu lta zhing zhugs pa yis // de ring khyod kyi sdig pa rnams //
translated: those who enter with the highest view🔽will be liberated today from all

original: ma lus @144b grol nas yang dag gnas //
analyzed: ma lus @144b grol nas yang dag gnas //
translated: their sins and will abide in reality.

original: gzhan yang khyod la 'pho ba med //
analyzed: gzhan yang khyod la 'pho ba med //
translated: Moreover, you will not be transferred

original: bde chen theg pa 'di nyid kyis //
analyzed: bde chen theg pa 'di nyid kyis //
translated: from this vehicle of great bliss.

original: 'khor ba shin tu dag byas nas //
analyzed: 'khor ba shin tu dag byas nas //
translated: Having thoroughly purified saṃsāra,🔽you will turn away from the sufferings of saṃsāra.

original: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams las log / tshe ldan de ring dbang nyid kyis //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams las log / tshe ldan de ring dbang nyid kyis //
translated: Today, through the empowerment,🔽you will definitely become the lord

original: sangs rgyas kun dang rdo rjer bcas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun dang rdo rjer bcas //
translated: of all the buddhas and vajras,

original: khams gsum kun gyi rgyal srid kyis //🔽rje bor khyod nyid nges pa'o //🔽'dod chags bral ba'i sdig lta bu //
analyzed: khams gsum kun gyi rgyal srid kyis // rje bor khyod nyid nges pa'o // 'dod chags bral ba'i sdig lta bu //
translated: and of the kingdom of the three realms.🔽There is no sin in the three realms

original: khams gsum na ni yod pa min //
analyzed: khams gsum na ni yod pa min //
translated: like the sin of being without desire.

original: de phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba //
analyzed: de phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba //
translated: Therefore, you should never act

original: khyod kyis nam yang bya ba min //
analyzed: khyod kyis nam yang bya ba min //
translated: in a way that is devoid of passion.

original: chags pa kun la nye bar spyod //
analyzed: chags pa kun la nye bar spyod //
translated: You should enjoy all that is passionate,

original: bde ba nam yang 'jigs byed ma //
analyzed: bde ba nam yang 'jigs byed ma //
translated: and never fear pleasure.

original: sha lnga bdud rtsi dang bcas spyod //
analyzed: sha lnga bdud rtsi dang bcas spyod //
translated: You should enjoy the five meats and the nectars,

original: dam tshig nam yang de bzhin gsungs //
analyzed: dam tshig nam yang de bzhin gsungs //
translated: and always keep your commitments.

original: srog gcod pa ni nam yang min //
analyzed: srog gcod pa ni nam yang min //
translated: You should never take life,

original: dpal gyi rin chen spang mi bya //🔽sdom pa spang bar mi bya zhing //
analyzed: dpal gyi rin chen spang mi bya // sdom pa spang bar mi bya zhing //
translated: and you should never abandon the jewel of glory.🔽You should never abandon your vows,

original: khyod kyis slob dpon mi spong ngo //
analyzed: khyod kyis slob dpon mi spong ngo //
translated: and you should never abandon your master.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ltar //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ltar //
translated: As the Tathāgata has said,

original: mi bya ba ni ci yang med //
analyzed: mi bya ba ni ci yang med //
translated: there is nothing that you should not do.

original: shes rab thabs kyi sems ldan pas //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyi sems ldan pas //
translated: You who possess the mind of wisdom and means

original: khyod la sdig med 'jigs mi dgos //
analyzed: khyod la sdig med 'jigs mi dgos //
translated: have no sin and need not fear.

original: zhes pa'i chos nyid 'dis cho ga ji lta ba bzhin dbang bskur nas /
analyzed: zhes pa'i chos nyid 'dis cho ga ji lta ba bzhin dbang bskur nas /
translated: Having conferred empowerment in accordance with the rite by means of this reality,

original: bu gcig pa la brtse ba ltar /
analyzed: bu gcig pa la brtse ba ltar /
translated: like a father who loves his only son,

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i brtse ba'i sems kyis dge bar dgongs pa 'di ni dbugs dbyung ba'i cho ga'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i brtse ba'i sems kyis dge bar dgongs pa 'di ni dbugs dbyung ba'i cho ga'i rim pa'o //
translated: the buddhas and bodhisattvas, with a mind of love, think of you as virtuous. This is the procedure for the rite of reassurance.

original: de ltar slob ma dbang thob cing dbugs phyung bas 'di ltar bya ste /🔽de ring bdag skyes 'bras bur bcas //
analyzed: de ltar slob ma dbang thob cing dbugs phyung bas 'di ltar bya ste / de ring bdag skyes 'bras bur bcas //
translated: Thus, the disciple, having obtained initiation and having been relieved, should act in this way.🔽Today I have been born with fruit.🔽Today I have been born with life and fruit.

original: bdag ni 'bras bu dang bcas srog / de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
analyzed: bdag ni 'bras bu dang bcas srog / de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
translated: Today I have been born in the family of the Buddha.

original: de ring sangs rgyas sras su gyur //
analyzed: de ring sangs rgyas sras su gyur //
translated: Today I have become a son of the Buddha.

original: ces brjod do //
analyzed: ces brjod do //
translated: Thus, he should speak.

original: de nas dbul ba ni /
analyzed: de nas dbul ba ni /
translated: Then, the offering:

original: glang po dang / rta dang / rin po che dang / gser dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang ; bran po dang / bran mo dang / yid du 'ong ba'i chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo la sogs pa ji ltar 'byor pa bla ma la gus pas dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: glang po dang / rta dang / rin po che dang / gser dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang ; bran po dang / bran mo dang / yid du 'ong ba'i chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo la sogs pa ji ltar 'byor pa bla ma la gus pas dbul bar bya'o //
translated: An elephant, a horse, jewels, gold, clothes, ornaments, cows, buffaloes, male and female servants, a pleasing wife, a son, a daughter, and so forth, whatever is available, should be offered to the guru with devotion.

original: de nas nyin mo'i dus su gzhon nu dang gzhon nu ma bcu la'o ma la sogs pa mngar ba'i ston mo bya'o //
analyzed: de nas nyin mo'i dus su gzhon nu dang gzhon nu ma bcu la'o ma la sogs pa mngar ba'i ston mo bya'o //
translated: Then, during the day, ten young men and ten young women should be offered sweet food such as milk and so forth.

original: chu tshod bdun song ba dang / dge slong dang dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la nya sha la sogs pa spangs pa'i mngar bas mnyes par byas te /
analyzed: chu tshod bdun song ba dang / dge slong dang dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la nya sha la sogs pa spangs pa'i mngar bas mnyes par byas te /
translated: When seven hours have passed, the community of monks and nuns should be pleased with sweet foods that avoid fish and so forth.

original: yon phul / lha khang du gshegs su gsol lo //🔽bug pa med pa bar du gcod pa med pa 'du 'dzi me dpa'i gnas su mtshan mo nyi ma rgas pa'i dus su rigs sum cu so drug gi dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma rnams gzhan gyis ma @145a * //
analyzed: yon phul / lha khang du gshegs su gsol lo // bug pa med pa bar du gcod pa med pa 'du 'dzi me dpa'i gnas su mtshan mo nyi ma rgas pa'i dus su rigs sum cu so drug gi dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma rnams gzhan gyis ma @145a * //
translated: Offer gifts and request them to enter the temple.

original: tshor bar zhugs la dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rim pas gnas pa ni /
analyzed: tshor bar zhugs la dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rim pas gnas pa ni /
translated: In a place that is free of holes, free of obstacles, free of distractions, at night when the sun has set, the lords of the heroes and heroines of the thirty-six clans enter without being noticed by others and abide by the sequence of the wheel of the mandala.

original: dbus su ba lang dang stag gi pags pa'i gdan la shes rab dang bcas pa'i gtso bo ste /🔽slob dpon sdod cing mi'i pags pa'i snod do //
analyzed: dbus su ba lang dang stag gi pags pa'i gdan la shes rab dang bcas pa'i gtso bo ste / slob dpon sdod cing mi'i pags pa'i snod do //
translated: In the center, the principal one with wisdom sits on a seat of bull and tiger skins,🔽the master sits on a human skin, and the vessel is made of human skin.

original: de'i g-yas phyogs su mi'i pags pa'i steng du g-yung mo'o //
analyzed: de'i g-yas phyogs su mi'i pags pa'i steng du g-yung mo'o //
translated: To his right, on a human skin, is Kaumārī.

original: phyogs rnams la khyi dang / rta dang / ba lang dang / glang po che'i pags pa'i stan rnams la dmangs rigs ma dang / rgyal rigs mo dang bram ze mo dang rje rigs ma rnams so //
analyzed: phyogs rnams la khyi dang / rta dang / ba lang dang / glang po che'i pags pa'i stan rnams la dmangs rigs ma dang / rgyal rigs mo dang bram ze mo dang rje rigs ma rnams so //
translated: In the directions, on the seats of the skins of a dog, a horse, a bull, and an elephant, are the śūdra woman, the kṣatriya woman, the brahmin woman, and the vaiśya woman.

original: mtshams rnams kyi byang shar nas dri chu dang dri chen dang / khrag dang / rkang rnams kyi snod rnams so //
analyzed: mtshams rnams kyi byang shar nas dri chu dang dri chen dang / khrag dang / rkang rnams kyi snod rnams so //
translated: In the intermediate directions, beginning in the northeast, are the vessels of urine, feces, blood, and semen.

original: de nas thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su bskor pa'i phyogs rnams su lug dang nags kyi khyi dang / rnga mo dang 'dam seng gi pags pa rnams la 'khar ba mkhan ma dang / aum bi'i steng du gar byed ma dang / nor bu byed ma dang /🔽khron pa byed ma rnams so //
analyzed: de nas thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su bskor pa'i phyogs rnams su lug dang nags kyi khyi dang / rnga mo dang 'dam seng gi pags pa rnams la 'khar ba mkhan ma dang / aum bi'i steng du gar byed ma dang / nor bu byed ma dang / khron pa byed ma rnams so //
translated: Then, in the directions surrounding the mind mandala, on the skins of a ram, a jungle-fowl, a camel, and a marsh-deer, are the basket-weaver, the dancer on the shoulders of an uṃbi, the jeweler, and the well-digger.

original: mtshams rnams la ra dang ri dags dang / bong bu dang phag pa'i pags pa'i stan rnams la thag ma dang / chang 'tshong ma dang / gser mgar ma dang phreng ba ma rnams so //
analyzed: mtshams rnams la ra dang ri dags dang / bong bu dang phag pa'i pags pa'i stan rnams la thag ma dang / chang 'tshong ma dang / gser mgar ma dang phreng ba ma rnams so //
translated: In the intermediate directions, on the seats of the skins of a goat, a deer, an ass, and a pig, are the weaver, the barmaid, the goldsmith, and the garland-maker.

original: de nas gsum pa gsung gi 'khor lo'i gnas la phyogs dang mtshams rnams la chu srin ku mbhi ra dang / 'gron bu'i phung po dang / ka ka ri'i phung po dang / nya sram dang / chu srin dang / sbal pa dang / rus sbal khog pa dang /🔽dung gi gdan rnams la shan pa ma dang bum pa byed ma dang / khur byed ma dang / smad 'tshong ma dang / khyogs mkhan ma dang / nya ba ma dang / gar ma dang / khrus mkhan ma rnams so //
analyzed: de nas gsum pa gsung gi 'khor lo'i gnas la phyogs dang mtshams rnams la chu srin ku mbhi ra dang / 'gron bu'i phung po dang / ka ka ri'i phung po dang / nya sram dang / chu srin dang / sbal pa dang / rus sbal khog pa dang / dung gi gdan rnams la shan pa ma dang bum pa byed ma dang / khur byed ma dang / smad 'tshong ma dang / khyogs mkhan ma dang / nya ba ma dang / gar ma dang / khrus mkhan ma rnams so //
translated: Then, in the third place of the wheel of speech, in the directions and the intermediate directions, on the seats of crocodile, tortoise,🔽heap of pearls, heap of kakarī, fish, otter, crocodile, frog, and tortoise shell, are the butcher, the potter, the carrier, the prostitute, the palanquin-bearer, the fisherman, the dancer, and the washerwoman.

original: de nas bzhi pha'i yongs su bskor ba'i phyogs su bse dang / stag dang / dred dang / don rnams kyi pags pa la lcags mgar ma dang / rgya skyegs mkhan ma dang / srin bal mkhan ma dang / mar khu mkhan rnams so //
analyzed: de nas bzhi pha'i yongs su bskor ba'i phyogs su bse dang / stag dang / dred dang / don rnams kyi pags pa la lcags mgar ma dang / rgya skyegs mkhan ma dang / srin bal mkhan ma dang / mar khu mkhan rnams so //
translated: Then, in the fourth place of the wheel of speech, in the directions and the intermediate directions, on the seats of the skins of the rhinoceros, tiger, leopard, and bear, are the blacksmith, the lac-dyeer, the cotton-carder, and the oil-miller.

original: mtshams rnams su me'i mtshams nas 'bri dang / ce sbyang ma dang / sram dang / byi la'i pags pa rnams la /
analyzed: mtshams rnams su me'i mtshams nas 'bri dang / ce sbyang ma dang / sram dang / byi la'i pags pa rnams la /
translated: In the intermediate directions, from the fire direction, there are the skins of a cat, otter, and mongoose.

original: smyug mkhan ma dang / shing mkhan ma dang / ko lpags mkhan ma dang / 'dreg mkhan ma rnams so //
analyzed: smyug mkhan ma dang / shing mkhan ma dang / ko lpags mkhan ma dang / 'dreg mkhan ma rnams so //
translated: On these are the weaver, carpenter, leather worker, and barber.

original: yongs su bskor ba lnga pa la go dh'a ba dang / byi ba dang / s'a la dzi ta ka dang / spre'u rnams la /
analyzed: yongs su bskor ba lnga pa la go dh'a ba dang / byi ba dang / s'a la dzi ta ka dang / spre'u rnams la /
translated: In the fifth surrounding area, there are the skins of a jackal, mouse, salajika, and monkey.

original: kla klo ma dang / mi gtsang 'phyag ma dang / dur khrod gnas ma dang / tshon rtsim rnams so //
analyzed: kla klo ma dang / mi gtsang 'phyag ma dang / dur khrod gnas ma dang / tshon rtsim rnams so //
translated: On these are the barbarian, sweeper, charnel ground dweller, and painter.🔽In the intermediate directions, from the fire direction, there are the skins of a rabbit, human, ichneumon, and frog.

original: mtshams kyi me mtshams nas ri bong dang / gzung mo dang / ai @145b shu ka pa shu dang / sbal pa rnams la ko skya ma dang / mthu ma dang mi rgod ma dang / ri khrod ma rnams so //
analyzed: mtshams kyi me mtshams nas ri bong dang / gzung mo dang / ai @145b shu ka pa shu dang / sbal pa rnams la ko skya ma dang / mthu ma dang mi rgod ma dang / ri khrod ma rnams so //
translated: On these are the prostitute, powerful woman, savage, and mountain dweller.

original: pags pa 'di rnams med na shar dang mer khyi'i pags pa'o //🔽lho dang bden bral du rta'i pags pa'o //
analyzed: pags pa 'di rnams med na shar dang mer khyi'i pags pa'o // lho dang bden bral du rta'i pags pa'o //
translated: If these skins are not available, then in the east and southeast there is a dog skin.🔽In the south and southwest there is a horse skin.

original: nub dang rlung du glang po che'i pags pa'o //
analyzed: nub dang rlung du glang po che'i pags pa'o //

original: byang dang dbang ldan du ba lang gi pags pa'o //
analyzed: byang dang dbang ldan du ba lang gi pags pa'o //
translated: In the northeast and northeast, the skin of a cow.

original: dbus su mi'i pags pa'o //
analyzed: dbus su mi'i pags pa'o //
translated: In the center, the skin of a human.🔽All of these yoginis are naked, with loose hair, and endowed with the five symbolic ornaments.

original: rnal 'byor ma 'di rnams ma lus pa gos dang bral ba skra grol ba phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa de rnams kyi g-yas rnams su dpa' bo yang de rnams dang mnyam pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma 'di rnams ma lus pa gos dang bral ba skra grol ba phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa de rnams kyi g-yas rnams su dpa' bo yang de rnams dang mnyam pa /
translated: To their right, the heroes are also like them,🔽endowed with the five symbolic ornaments.

original: phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa de rnams la pags pa'i gdan sbyin par bya'o //🔽de rnams btung ba'i snod ni shar dang mer nya phyis so //

analyzed: lho dang lho nub tu na ri ke la'i snod do //
translated: in the south and southwest, a coconut vessel;

original: nub dang rlung du kham phor ro //
analyzed: nub dang rlung du kham phor ro //

original: byang dang dbang ldan du mi'i thod pa'o //
analyzed: byang dang dbang ldan du mi'i thod pa'o //
translated: in the north and northeast, a human skull;

original: dbus su shing gi por pa rnams so //
analyzed: dbus su shing gi por pa rnams so //

original: de nas dam tshig gi rdzas rnams kyi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: de nas dam tshig gi rdzas rnams kyi rang bzhin te /
